name: Disrepair
description: Disrepair is a 9 (10 counting secret) map episode that makes use of G/ZDoom enhancements, including, but not limited to, DECORATE monsters, 3D Floors, and Scripted Events. There is also a Survival Mode included, which changes seven of the maps into an endless horde mode with some slight objectives.

name: The Green Machine
description: he Green Machine is a 12-level PK3 for Doom II that requires the GZDoom source port to play. It was the second mapset created by speedrunner Andrea Rovenski (Cyberdemon531), and features such additions as decorate monsters, 3D floors and scripted events. Released in November 2014 as part of her continuing SecretDoom series, The Green Machine features medium to hard maps, with improved atmosphere and level design over her initial offering, Disrepair.

name: Hell's Memento
description: Hell's Memento is a 12-Map GZDoom wad that has heavy inspiration from classic wads like "Memento Mori", "TNT Evilution", "Requiem", etc. with GZDoom features such as 3D Floors, ACS Scripts, and Decorate Powerups/Monsters.

name: Disrepair 2
description: Disrepair 2 is an 11 map episode for GZDoom that expands upon the ideas and themes of my original Secretdoom episode "Disrepair" and transforms it into a new expansive world. This mapset features new monster types, new music, new textures, and of course new maps .

name: A War On Christmas
description: After reports of a mass slaughtering of good little children by a crazed man in a Santa suit, you track them down to one final stand-off. This is A War On Christmas...

name: Existential Dread
description: Existential Dread was a warmup project, to get back into making doom maps and vanilla in particular.

name: Autophagy
description: Autophagy.WAD is an old school megawad aiming for a mixture of Evilution, Scythe, Demonfear, and other classic experiences. Levels range from very easy to moderately challenging. This should be played in dsda-doom -complevel 2. 33 retro maps with fast and intense action!

name: Game of Throne: Toilet Simulator
description: Made in just one day!

name: Hands
description: A surreal 3D platformer about hands

name: Aegis
description: Aegis is a first-person horror adventure game set within the ruins of Medusa's temple.

name: Dotower
description: DoTower is a light casual Rogue game in the real-time combat category. Players will play a spherical hero guarding their home, hitting enemies by adjusting their direction, using various skills, synthesizing exclusive equipment, defeating the tower apostles. enjoy the magic of battle billiards!

name: Guilty: Ashlar
description: This is an easy to get started role-playing, adventure and exploration single player game that tells the exciting story of several criminals who experience adventures in a desolate and forbidden world.

name: Ten no Yukururu
description: Sin descripción

name: Tetsumi Mahjong
description: Sin descripción

name: Ep. Kazoku
description: A first-person Japanese horror game.

name: Chilla's Art: The Kidnap
description: The Kidnap is a Japanese horror game about a kidnapping incident.

name: Persona 3 Reload: DLC Pack
description: Persona 3 Reload DLC Pack includes all purchasable additional content.

name: Persona 3 Reload: Persona 5 Royal Persona Set 2
description: Persona 3 Reload: Persona 5 Royal Persona Set 2 contains additional content that allows you to use Personas from Persona 5 Royal.

name: Persona 3 Reload: Persona 5 Royal Persona Set 1
description: Persona 3 Reload: Persona 5 Royal Persona Set 1 contains additional content that allows you to use Personas from Persona 5 Royal.

name: Zeitghast
description: Run, dash, shoot, and slash your way through a mechanized prehistoric world in this fast paced platformer-shooter. Keep your eye on the clock while trying to stop an evil mad scientist from disrupting the timeline!

name: Vampires' Melody 2
description: Emerald seas! Blue skies! Sandy beaches! An island adventure in the ocean sounds like a trip to paradise. However, the place is a nightmare with no one to provide any blood for Raylan to feed on after he turned into a vampire by accident, especially since he has another hungry vampire at his side.

name: Warrior Next
description: Few against many... Fight with a handful of Spartans to save Greece. Destroy hordes of enemies until the fight with creatures sent by the Gods. Lots of action for everyone!

name: What The Gravity
description: Prepare for the electrifying space adventure as a delivery specialist in the legendary United Space Force (USF). Embark on a high-octane delivery run, navigating treacherous space battlefields, and defying all odds to ensure the success of your critical mission - before the beer gets warm.

name: Where's My Loot?
description: Where's My Loot? is a hidden object game in a fantasy world. The loot from your last adventure was lost. Search around and find all your precious items back.

name: Whispers of an Elven Captor
description: Whispers of an Elven Captor is an erotic visual novel. As a captive, you're questioned by elven Ayelith, eager to prove herself and protect her realm. Reluctance sparks an intimate exchange of questions, escalating to daring demands over time. From reserved to explicit, Ayelith's journey unfolds.

name: Wings of Seduction : Bust 'em out!
description: Clothing damage + Survivor + Modified weapon. A girl is in danger! Rip her clothes off and save her! Get your mind out of the gutter and let's go because you are The One. Powerful weapons and outstanding skills- giving you an exceptional roguelike shoot-‘em-up experience each time!

name: Tank Battle Resist
description: In the face of a large number of fierce enemy steel torrents, the real warrior is not afraid of danger. Come on, let's defeat the enemy and protect our camp together.

name: The Blogger
description: The Blogger is a third-person horror game focused on story, exploration, and solving simple puzzles to progress through a terrifying atmosphere. Take control of our protagonist, a young photographer for a horror blog.

name: Telluria: Forebodings Gear Minigame
description: Help Annelise open the doors of the water mill (1st Age) or the library (3rd Age) solving visual and textual riddles.

name: The Castle Mystery
description: A first-person horror game where you step into the shoes of a historian who, on a solo mission, receives a tempting invitation to explore a long-abandoned castle. Drawn by the promise of a generous reward, you accept the offer without hesitation.

name: Swordai
description: Swordai is a multiplayer, first-person, medieval slasher featuring fast paced directional combat and a deep skill tree. Master your sword as you carve your way through monsters, epic bosses, and other players in your quest to ascend the tower.

name: SIFC: Survival - In First Contact
description: SIFC is a boring zombie game. All you need to do is fighting zombies in the game and trying you best to survive in zombie tides until victory.

name: SickOw
description: This is an RPG game where you will follow our protagonist to fight and save lives!

name: Quantum War
description: In this top-down 2D flat shooting game, you are piloting the most advanced spacecraft and must survive the unknown siege of extraterrestrial life, defeat the lord, and return to the human universe.

name: Soulstone of Hope
description: Embark on a heroic journey in this captivating fantasy turn-based JRPG. Choose your path as a fearless Warrior, cunning Rogue, or powerful Mage, each with unique abilities. Form unbreakable bonds with your companions and uncover the secrets of the forgotten catacombs.

name: Soulgasm
description: Come in, come in! Immerse yourself in a dating sim adventure filled with romance and intrigue. Wander through the Palace's hidden chambers, unravel its mysteries, build lasting bonds, and woo the ladies! Let your choices guide your path as you enhance your Eromancy skills. Your love story awaits!

name: Son of the Dragon King
description: Son of the Dragon King, a beat 'em up action saga, with captivating storytelling at its core, RPG-like character growth, and intricate crafting. Your path—a blend of honor and redemption—will decide feudal Japan's fate. Can you emerge as the champion, facing down the elemental warlords?

name: Smokey's Rescue Team
description: Smokey's Rescue Team is a cat rescue/adoption simulator that allows you to interact and look after cats that have been abandoned in front of your home. You will need to take care of all the cats and make sure they are fed and happy until you can find them a new home.

name: Six Ears
description: This is an RPG game where you will follow our protagonist to fight and save lives!

name: Space Mining Company
description: Dive into the exciting adventure and conquer your own business in Space Mining Company - a world of limitless possibilities! Prepare to scour the solar system for precious ores and sell them for profit.

name: Steampunk Jigsaw Puzzles: Samurai Clans
description: Revolution is afoot in the land of the rising sun. The shogun’s power is fading fast, while rival warlords muster their troops as they plot their ascent to the throne.

name: Steel Roamer
description: Immerse yourself in Steel Roamer's chilling experience, trapped in an RV, pitted against unimaginable terrors lurking outside. Driving is your only goal.

name: Super Retro Rec League Racing
description: Race against the clock in Super Retro Rec League Racing! Perfect your lines, optimize every turn, time your pits, and push yourself to absolute mastery.

name: Super Paul World
description: Experience a great adventure in "Super Paul World" where you defeat many enemies while trying to retrieve the Cookie Nexus Core for Baker Tim. Earn experience points (EXP) to acquire various cosmetic items.

name: Sushi for Empress Setsuko
description: “Sushi for Empress Setsuko” is a cozy fishing game, yuri dating sim, and point & click adventure set in a fantastical Japan-inspired land. Follow Mizumi Nagashima as she travels around the Empire, seeing gorgeous views, catching delicious fish, and charming beautiful women.

name: The Backrooms Recorded
description: Navigate a nightmarish labyrinth, avoid eerie entities, and uncover dark secrets in this liminality based horror game. Explore realistic levels, unravel secrets, and figure out life or death puzzles. Will you escape the madness? Brought to you by a solo 13 year old dev.

name: Pixel Puzzles WW2 Jigsaw: Pack - The Blitz
description: Pixel Puzzles World War II, merging history with the definitive jigsaw puzzler on the PC platform.

name: Puzzle of Selene
description: Dive into a fantasy world with this charming picture-matching puzzle game! Solve puzzles with unique female characters in a beautiful world and enjoy full-voice episodes with them. A new adventure where puzzle solving and excitement intersect awaits you.

name: Project Mix
description: Project Mix is a VR Visual Novel where you play as a bartender in a seedy cyberpunk bar. Featuring waifu's, smooth bartending and narrative storytelling.

name: Project DarkHeaZ
description: Progress through short levels to face enemies and final bosses to save your life. Win and you'll level up, fail and you'll level down. The whole galaxy depends on you!.

name: Popucom
description: Play with friends and utilize color switching, match-3 shooting, and companion powers to advance in a mysterious, foreign world. Embark on an incredible adventure to restore life and bring new hope to a ravaged planet.

name: Philna Fantasy
description: This is a pixel-art style action role-playing game with exciting storylines, different career choices, cute art style, lively battles, and rich character development.Let's go and start the adventure.

name: Petty's Adventure: Volcano
description: Petty's Adventure: Volcano is a colorful game with changing gravity in which you have collect crystals to complete a level.

name: Horrific Xanatorium
description: A world where Spilia, a virus that causes delusions and hallucinations, has become epidemic. A horror visual novel game set in a hospital where patients are isolated.

name: Mission: Diamond Back
description: Mission : Diamond Back is a First-Person Shooter that follows the story of a security breach in one of DiamondBack's research units. In order to survive you must Search , Report and Kill.

name: Mozzies
description: A colourful retro style matching game. Squash Mozzies and match splatter colours before time runs out.

name: Mr. K.I.S.S.
description: Mr. K.I.S.S. is an indie rooftop runner and spiritual successor to classic games like Canabalt or Vector. It features endless procedural levels, a skill tree, real-time dynamic difficulty system, hand drawn character animations, and a poignant story of a fractured soul facing the ultimate shadow...

name: Myriad Hotel
description: A silly hotel-management visual novel. Impress clients, earn money, and resolve issues for your staff to keep the hotel from going under.

name: Olive's Art-Venture
description: Olive's Art-Venture is a spell-slinging arena and mobbing game. Use the paper on the right side of the screen to draw shapes which then cast spells, damaging enemies and protecting you.

name: Walk With Me
description: This is a collage of memories when I lived in Germany at the age of five. I remember the memory of staring at the ground, it was snowing.

name: A Day at the Beach
description: A very short flatgame for class about a day at the beach with my girlfriend and feeling helpless.

name: On a Cloudy Day
description: On a Cloudy Day is a short, autobiographical vignette game by Emperatriz Ung. It is an interactive memory that captures the loneliness experienced during the hospitalization intake process. Designed to narratively compliment & be played alongside with Carol Mertz's "I'll be here."

name: I'll Be Here.
description: "I'll be here" is a 10-hour prototype made for the NYU Game Center's prototype studio MFA class. This prototype is designed to be played alongside Emperatriz Ung's "On A Cloudy Day."

name: Swapdown
description:
Step into the pulsating world of Swapdown, where every second counts and your wits are tested to the limit! In this exhilarating "match three" extravaganza, players are given a thrilling 60 seconds to slide shapes in all directions - left, right, up, and down, with the goal of aligning the perfect trio of colors.

But that's not all! Feel the board has become too predictable? Hit the "Space Bar" and watch as Swapdown's dynamic arena reshuffles, throwing an array of fresh combinations your way. The clock is ticking, but if the pressure becomes too much, the trusty hint button awaits to give you that gentle nudge in the right direction.

Compete against friends or challenge yourself to beat your personal best. As the seconds dwindle, the pace intensifies, and the adrenaline soars. Only the sharpest eyes and quickest reflexes will emerge victorious with the highest score.

With vibrant visuals, an addictive soundtrack, and nail-biting gameplay, Swapdown guarantees a heart-racing experience from start to finish.

Are you geared up for a minute of mayhem? Dive into Swapdown, where the clock is your biggest rival, and glory awaits the swiftest swiper! ⏱️

name: A Belief in a Perfect Today
description:
This is the story of a day that we wanted to be perfect. A bank holiday trip to Brighton with friends. A chance to see the ocean, to see a band, to see slot machines and eat doughnuts.

This is a story of a day that wasn't perfect. A day of fighting through hangovers, of trying to have a good time, of putting up with bad weather, of trying not to snap.

This is a story. It focuses on the cracks.

name: I'm Yearning for a Train Journey
description: Sin descripción

name: Paint Monsters
description: Blend vibrant paint monsters in colorful strokes to defeat the Ink King and restore color to the world! Install now for free to highlight each canvas with magical boosters and celebrate with a disco dance party!

name: Princess Bubble Story
description: Bubble puzzler full of magic!

name: Candlebook Island
description: Make friends with your coworkers, discover their lives and history, treat sick monsters, and research mysterious illnesses!

name: Nathan Jones and The Eternal Myth
description: Follow Nathan Jones on his epic quest through magical worlds and emotional challenges to unlock the secrets of an ancient myth and save the World.

name: Champion of Fighters
description: Get ready to unleash your inner warrior and secure your place among the legends!

name: Word Quest
description: Are you ready to wield words as weapons and conquer the quest?

name: Pure Mini Golf and Pool Puzzles Bundle
description: Experience the ultimate gaming combo with Pool Puzzles and Pure Mini Golf!

name: The Jumping Food Memory
description:
Embark on an unforgettable card memory adventure!

Dive into the fascinating world of our brand new card memory video game developed by the creators of "The Jumping Food" Games. We proudly present an exciting gameplay with a homage to our Jumping Games and a pinch of challenge that will keep you hooked for a long time.

Each of our three kitchens holds unique levels full of tricky card pairs. Find the right combinations to unlock the next level and put your memory skills to the test.

name: Turbo Dash Kart 2023 Racing
description: Race to Glory, Race to Win – it's time to conquer the track!

name: Mudness Offroad 2
description: Unleash Your Off-Road Passion and Leave Rivals in Your Dust!

name: Loinkham TD
description: A tower defense game set in the village of Loinkham. Use towers and various interactable objects in the environment to protect your little oinkers and their assests! Each map offers something new to help you with your journey. Unlock new towers and maps as you play.

name: Fair and Square
description: Fair and Square is a fast paced real time strategy where you will need to defend your base against multiple waves or battle opponents. Play with or against friends chosing not one faction but a combination of factions.

name: Ghost Tag
description: It's the classic game of tag, but for ghosts! In this multiplayer party game, you can use spectral super powers like vanishing and possessing objects to gain an edge on your opponents and be the tag champion!

name: Keo and the Cosmic Crystals
description: Keo and the Cosmic Crystals is a 2D platform game with colorful and cute graphics, featuring high difficulty and precision challenges.

name: Arena 9th
description: Welcome to the AUTO-CARD Competition of The Ninth Universe. You can show your skills, enter a higher level of competition, and strive to win the glory of the universe championship.

name: A Night at the Watermill
description: You wake up in an old watermill in the middle of the night ... and can't remember anything. Examine the surroundings in this thrilling point&click adventure and find out what happened.

name: Demon Slayer Shion
description: When her fellow Demon Slayer, Ayano, disappears in the depths of an enormous dungeon, Shion and her friends take it upon themselves to find her.

name: Just Hide
description: Just hide is an exciting stealth-action game. Each level presents a challenge for your mastery, but the smart use of the environment and various gadgets will help you find a way out of any situation.

name: Mannequin
description: Play as a clothing store worker who is just finishing up her shift and preparing to go home. However, as you make your way towards the exit, the power suddenly goes out, leaving you trapped inside the store.

name: Death Lease
description: You will die.

name: 4D Games
description: 4D Shapes, 4D Chess and 4D Mazes!? Take a deep dive into the world of Four Dimensions, with more control than ever before!

name: Die in the Dungeon: Origins
description: Fight your way through a mysterious dungeon in this deck-building, turn-based roguelike where you don't use cards, but dice! Deal with enemies by combining dice on your board, boost their effects with magical relics, and discover the story behind Die in the Dungeon!

name: Farewell To Sunshower
description: Survive in purgatory.

name: 3D Chess Online
description: 3D Chess Online combines the magical world of chess with a modern and three-dimensional experience! Determine your strategy and fight against your opponents worldwide in this simulator equipped with realistic graphics.

name: Halloween Naughty Girls
description: Halloween Naughty Girls is a collection of adult visual novels inspired by classic horror movies from the 80s and 90s.

name: Hidden Glade
description: Hidden Glade is a 2D simulation role-playing video game set in a fantastic world of mysteries and unexplored worlds. Go on a new adventure together with Tobi. Develop your new home, find answers to your questions and go to your goal.

name: Enemy Trench
description: Enemy Trench is a Roguelike set during the First World War. You play as a British soldier fighting your way through enemy lines hoping to survive. You must contend with an onslaught of enemy soldiers, deadly terrain, gas attacks and more. Do you have what it takes to survive in the Enemy Trench?

name: Kitten's Wardrobe
description: This is a relaxing casual game. Take a walk in Dessert Town, explore more areas, and meet new friends. The Kitten has the ability to turn the stuff in the painting into reality. Help it gather new clothing through drawing!

name: Last Lesson
description: It's your first night as the caretaker of a scary quest. The last visitors have gone home. You need to turn off the lights, check the equipment and not die of horror, because someone or something suddenly starts a nightmarish game. With you in the lead.

name: Eyewinder
description: Run, glide, and grapple across an open world filled with floating islands. Armed with an Eye that gives you the power to rewind and accelerate time, use it to solve puzzles, fight enemies, and rescue your dragon friends.

name: Butterfly again
description: In a world where not everyone has magic, the kingdom is suffering from an infestation known as "Insect Demon". But only those who can use magic can see the Insect Demon...

name: MindXcope
description: MindXcope is a surreal VR rogue-lite action game. Enter a bizarre world originates from people's daily struggles to embark on an unexpected adventure. Gain your weapons, hack and slash your way through scenes symbolizing your dilemmas, eliminate your nightmares and unravel the secrets.

name: Border Clash
description: Border Clash is a tactical, simultaneous turn-based, multiplayer strategy game where you manage resources, research technologies, build an army and invade countries to expand your territory. Defeat various AI opponents or challenge your friends to an epic 6-player FFA battle.

name: Minute
description: A 3D action platformer where you play as a wind-up toy in a Tinkerer's workshop set in the Victorian Age. As a small wind-up toy, you must rely on your wind-up key to embark on an arduous journey. Defeat enemies and uncover a dark secret within the rooms.

name: Drift Vector
description: Drift Vector is a minimalist, glowing neon synthwave-inspired, indie, retro arcade asteroids-like game for 1-4 players with an unconventional control scheme that encourages ballet-like manoeuvres to line up the perfect shot while collecting powerups and avoiding rockets, opponents & other obstacles.

name: Helle's Undersea City Project: Bringing Air to The Garden
description: Grow and expand the land with air, aiming to rebuild the undersea city with a lone girl, Hele! A new type of undersea city-building simulation game!

name: Crystalish
description: Crystalish - A side-view game with a physical world where the player must destroy blocks in a certain amount while controlling the balance of the fish and not allowing it to fall off the screen.

name: English Is Hard_
description: An arcade style typing game that evokes the nostalgia of Missile Command. Defend your cows, shoot aliens, and go for the high score!

name: Cropisle TD
description: After an earthquake, you're sent to an island for rebuilding. Face nightly critter attacks, set up towers, and farm. Your mission is to seal the island or secure crops before defenses are breached. Now, grab your shovel and hammer, and enter the defensive battle!

name: Harmonic Depths
description: Embark on a relaxing journey in an underwater realm. Glide through captivating environments, embracing the tranquility of exploration and survival found in these Harmonic Depths.

name: Mansion of Memories
description: Investigate the old manor, compete for the inheritance, or dive into mysteries left by your late aunt along with her will. Your choices decide whether other inhabitants of the mansion become your foes or friends… or someone special.

name: I Am Zombie
description: This is an RPG game where you will follow our protagonist to fight and save lives!

name: Little Green Girl
description: One day the protagonist meets an alien girl and the story turns...

name: Grandmasters Ascent
description: Unleash the fusion of classic Chess strategy and electrifying card game mechanics. Navigate a familiar board with the unpredictability of your card deck. Choose your moves, strategize your plays, and outwit opponents in this riveting blend of tactics and chance. Ready for the ultimate duel?

name: Brick on the Head
description: As a manager of an hospital near bankrupt, you find that a brick on the head will give you patients. Also play on Hospital Mode where you can build your own hospital, take care of patients, protect him with security guards...

name: Grand Forest
description: Embark on a cozy & relaxing journey through the heart of nature's embrace in Grand Forest, a delightful walking simulator that beckons you to unwind, explore, and savor the simple pleasures of life.

name: Heat Division: Rescue Team
description: Rescue civilians from natural and man-made disasters in this Speedrunning 2D Platformer. Featuring 4 playable characters: Jack Red, John Blue, Jane Orange & Chief Green

name: Baby Climbing
description: baby climbing is a 3d third person game where you control a baby in a dream where you have to climb platforms in order to reach the end. climb the platforms and complete the mission without falling and overcoming the obstacles

name: Marshmallow Imouto Succubus
description: Tsukikawa Keisuke had a strange dream. That dream involved his younger sister but instead of her usual, innocent self, she had lust in her eyes. So he finds out that a succubus lurks within her! How will he choose between his innocent sister and the allure of a lustful succubus?!

name: Bullezine
description: In Bullezine, you guide Luna, the queen of Bullezine, to save her people from "oblivion." Inspired by classic roguelites, Bullezine aims to be a simplified and accessible version of the genre for a wider audience.
Old-skool FPS gameplay with modern graphics and extra horror.

name: Get Me Out, Please
description: Work together with friends to escape an abandoned school in this horror escape action game for up to four players, but beware: one of you will become a monster.

name: Cataclysm Survivors
description: Cataclysm Survivors is an action packed roguelike in the survivors genre. With countless weapons and upgrades, play through endless waves of zombies and become INFINITELY POWERFUL. Thousands of Weapon and Upgrade combinations and TONS of enemies to slaughter with multiple classes and maps.

name: HBD-RPG
description: Interactive Role-Playing Game (RPG)

name: Maze Monsters
description: Maze Monsters is a procedurally generated, roguelike dungeon platformer where vicious threats and dangerous foes make for an original and action-packed adventure every time.

name: Asteroids Star Fields
description: It is an awesome space war game. It is a very simple game. Move the spaceship and shoot the asteroids. Try to make the highest score. It is an easy and time killing game. You can play to rest and relax between the big games you play.

name: Filled to the Limit
description: ​A newspaper ad inspires a girl to become a test subject for a tube-feeding machine, and must reach her full capacity!

name: Cardia
description: Cardia, a world of breathtaking vastness.

name: Card Collector And Card Girls
description: Control: Keyboard arrow keys, A button = Z, B button = X This game has no story. You just have to defeat enemies and acquire skill cards to learn skills or acquire items to challenge stronger enemies. Battle is turn-based, Use your skills appropriately. Please have fun with these beauties.

name: Fly With The Yellow Crane
description: Soaring in the daytime, where are you going? This game will give a possibility. The night is long, and the road is full of branches. Good and evil are difficult to balance. Beauty is disaster or blessing? Regrets long live in the world. I can only imagine the utopia in the fairyland.

name: Fortress Defense
description: 'Fortress Defense' is a cartoon style defense game. Players can summon archers and upgrade to different roles to block the enemy's attack.

name: Corn Kidz 64
description: The unauthorized, kid-friendly version of the classic Stephen King thriller (or maybe not, maybe it's just a game about one-horned goatbabies)

name: Jump Queen
description: Get to the top in the really challenging platformer Jump Queen! You don't need a hot girl, she's already here. You just need to move up because the fall price is too high. Jump, collect coins, look for secrets and get to the top.

name: Brain Quiz
description: Brain Quiz crazy general quiz game... Challenge your brain, and your culture

name: Aradena: Battlegrounds
description: A medieval fantasy turn-based strategy game

name: Akpala
description: Dive into an action-packed VR game featuring magical battles! Experience authentic spellcasting with a voice recognition system that activates magic as you chant. Swing your arms and pose to amplify your spells, offering a thrilling, immersive magical experience.

name: Aerodangle
description: Aerodangle is a chaotic mix of high-speed flying, parkour with a grappling hook and a stream of airplanes falling apart in the air.

name: Digit Dare
description:
Dare yourself in this challenging puzzle game.
Digit Dare is a fast puzzle game where you can prove yourself and grow your skill to finally feel confident and competent at mental math.
Solve nine puzzles before the time runs out or play the relaxing Zen mode to train your brain. Dare to ascent the tough pyramid and improve yourself with gold medals along the way. See your progress while completing quests, collecting stars and gaining new levels.

name: Farmdale
description: No more regular farming! Get ready for the most exciting game ever! Here you will not simply plant plants and raise animals, you will be a part of a real magic adventure with other characters, an exciting plot, dangerous journeys, competitive markets and a world that keeps on growing!

name: Math Fight
description:
Get Math Fight: 2 Player Math Game and learn math with cool math games for kids!
Two can have fun at the same time! Math Fight: 2 Player Math Game is one of those fun educational games where two players fight each other mathematically. Cool game for kids and adults is here!

name: A Balloon Game
description: Keep the balloons in the air! Last as long as you can in this relaxing little game.

name: Lars
description: Lars: Super Action Danger Lizard! is a full-featured platform game with hand-drawn pixel art, faithful old-school controls, classic retro soundtracks, and over 60 huge levels of jumping scrolling action. Each level has plenty of pickups and secrets to explore.

name: Buddyman Run
description: Buddyman is the latest toy to hit the shelves. We don't know who thought it would be a good idea to give a toy a working weapon, but thanks to them, you can now play the first ever action-runner!

name: Grab the Apple
description: Drag your long, doodle arms through dozens of puzzle levels, as you strive to grab all the apples.

name: Super Atomic
description:
Super Atomic is pure, minimal game about a incredible test of patience & reaction!
All who have attempted Impossible Games will know the pleasurably painful twitching you are about to endure but with added vertigo.
Each exciting tap requires quick reflexes and super fast decisions. Super Atomic is also fulfilled with Neon & Dubstep.
Warning: Speed Limit will be raised after each level!

name: Grugs
description: Are you looking for a challenging adventure platformer game to charge your nerves? How about taking on a new survival adventure designed for a thrilling reflex test action? With this amazing side scroller game, you get to experience an immersive adventure story and enjoy the best of caveman games. Run and jump with various characters to overcome the obstacle course challenges. Reach the challenging boss fight levels and show your impressive auto runner skills to become the number one caveman.

name: Argamasa
description: In Argamasa you control Demetrius, a man who creates solidified fire walls. This power is used by an organization called FIRE, that makes him build things with that power. You need to figure out the best way to build those images that are proposed through challenges that resemble "pixel art". To build them you need to know to position youself on the screen and be careful to not get trapped in the walls that you create.

name: Fat Birds
description:
It's a tough life above the trees. Dodge and dip through the sky avoiding other birds as you compete for food. As you eat pallets you gain experience developing more stamina as you level up.
It's your turn to control the sky!

name: A Bike Ride to the Creek
description: I lived in rural North Carolina during my elementary school years, and loved to explore the forests, ponds, and trails that surrounded my neighborhood. These places are all but gone now due to encroaching development, so making a game that retraces the trail to the creek has been a way for me to preserve and revisit some really happy childhood memories.

name: Make a Cake
description:
Once upon a time there was a wicked witch who captured fairies from the land of fairy tales. Only Popsy escaped but she must make a cake to save her friends. Join this magical journey and be a hero in this cooking game.
Get ready for the fight against an evil witch and participate in this exciting cooking story! Be a cake maker and help Popsy in this cooking cake game by making the most beautiful cakes that will put a witch to deep sleep. While she is asleep, Popsy will rescue her fairy friends. Beware! If you don't bake and dress up a cake on time it will fall apart and the evil will win.

name: MyDream Universe: Build Solar
description:
MyDream Universe is a sandbox space simulation game. Start from a small asteroid absorbing other asteroids to form a solar system. Roaming sandbox universe and discover wandering planets or solars, your solar system can earn GP and mass. GP is important to build your system. It is very easy to earn, simply roaming the universe and near other planets you will receive a GP.
Mass is everything in the universe. Biggest mass planet alway can destroy other smaller mass planets. So, find smaller mass planets and absorb them, and away from heavy mass planet is the survival rule in the universe.
Also mass is available on everywhere, roaming the universe. It is easy to find asteroids, absorb them to develop your planets.
This game is mainly focus on develop and growth the solar system. Absorbing mass is slow and long term. Once your sun has enough mass, it can be transform to neutron star or blackhole.
In order to let you freely build your dream solar system, we provide a 100 save area. So you can build up to 100 different solar system.

name: Bubble Shooting Robots
description:
Choose your robot and get ready to fight waves of enemies with your bubble cannon. The more bubbles you pop at the same time, the more points and coins you will get.
Your bubble cannon improves every time you defeat a boss, but your enemies will also become more and more powerful.
Bubble Shooting Robots, in addition to being a fun and entertaining game, is de-stressing and relaxing. Who doesn't enjoy popping bubbles?

name: Super Fishermind
description: The goal is being able to find the correct combination of colored fish within a fixed number of attempts. With Super Fishermind you will be able to keep your mind trained while having fun!

name: My Daddy, My Christmas
description: My Daddy, My Christmas is an adorable game about being a good Daddy, and trying hard to get back with his daughter for Christmas!

name: Holiday Tapp Gingerbread Chase
description:
Ho, ho, ho..! It seems Santa hasn't noticed he is loosing gifts!
Help him and catch as many gifts as you can. Some gifts contain gingerbread stickers, which you can use when sending iMessages to your family and friends.
What's more, if you catch 12 different gingerbread cookies in a single game you will unlock over 40 stickers including 19 animated ones!
If you have no patience you may also purchase all stickers via in app purchase.
If you are logged to Game Center you can also see leaderboard with results of other players and you will also get awards for achievements in saving gifts for Santa (and eating the candy). You can also challenge your friends.
Get ready for Christmas and start counting those gifts and collect stickers while you wait for real Santa!

name: Planet Quest
description: Tap on the rhythm, climb the leaderboard and become the master of the universe.

name: December 25, 2016
description: A game about a nightmare I woke up from christmas day.

name: Vikings: Valhalla
description:
Earn your place among the gods in this strategy game based on the hit series. Build your settlement and lead raids against rivals to become a legend.
Ready to immerse yourself in the world of Vikings: Valhalla?
Prove your might in PvP battles, build and upgrade your settlement, recruit and lead your warband on raids against rivals for resources, riches and glory. Defend your settlement from enemy attacks and take part in campaign battles to progress through an original story inspired by the hit Netflix series!

name: Knights of Grayfang
description:
The land of Eldraad is in the midst of a war between the humans, born from the Twilight Deity, and the monsters, born from the Nightfall Deity, to control all nine temples. King Edwahl wields twilight's might, turning humans into vampires via a ritual. Yet, a sinister force awakens among monsters. Will nightfall or twilight triumph?
One of the main characters, Thoma, wields a unique Blood Gauge, replacing HP and MP. Using this gauge, characters can activate Bloodthirst, granting new skills and appearances. Equip bats found in dungeons for passive effects like protection from ailments and boosted attack power. Seize victory by claiming all nine temples. Unravel the mysteries and battle the monsters within to conquer them!

name: Hop Hero: A Leap of Faith
description:
Tap to jump your way up to the top. Easy, right?
Avoid spinning saws, precisely land on platforms and slowly reach the top.
Be careful though! One wrong jump will land you all the way back at the beginning.

name: Maths War
description:
Join the mathematical battle as two superpowers in a clash of wars, striving for victory in the middle of a fierce snow storm! Nurture your wits and reflexes in this exciting Battleship-inspired game. In this arithmetic war, each player commands an army of fighters.
Lead your army to victory by labeling correct and incorrect equations that appear on the screen. Remember that time does not wait for the weak! Choose the right answer as quickly as possible to destroy an enemy jet. Selecting the wrong answer will block your next move for a few seconds, so keep your calm and choose wisely, Commander. The first to shoot down all jets wins the war.

name: Laundry Idle
description:
You spend your life time saving money to open a laundry service... Now let's hire someone to start the business.
It starts as a small dream but you know one day your washing company will be come a popular franchise. Keep on working, together everyone will earn more coins.

name: Wonder Witches
description: Woohoooo! Welcome to the world of Wonder Witches! Collect magical potions, unlock witches with special broomsticks and enjoy the scenery. Watch out for those clouds in the sky and most important.

name: Tile Tale
description: Got three minutes and want to solve a puzzle? Try Tile Tale. 6 levels, 455 built-in single player puzzles. Just connect tiles with the same color, that's all. Easy to play.

name: Flappy Toss
description: Just Tap the Screen! Tap! Tap! Tap! The Balls fly to the hoop! Challenge for the longest shot!

name: Jackpot 2
description: Jackpot 2 is a casual game. After starting the game, it has three wheels to turn. When the wheel stops, the icon stopped at the winning line matches the winning pattern, and the player will get the winning amount indicated by the winning pattern.

name: OMSI 2: Agora Bus Family Citybus Vol. 1
description: Plunge into the middle of the urban hustle and bustle with the Renault Agora DLC for OMSI 2. Explore the narrow streets, master the challenges of traffic and feel the adrenaline of rush hour - all with the comfort of your passengers in mind.

name: 1Dreamboy
description: 1Dreamboy is an unofficial dating simulator based on One Direction. It is the first part of the 1Dreamboy series.

name: Assetto Corsa EVO
description: Assetto Corsa EVO is the sequel to 2014’s racing simulator Assetto Corsa, which featured a range of road, track, racing, historic and drift cars as well as laser-scanned tracks

name: Pokemon Myth
description: Pokemon Myth is a fan made pokemon game, set in a new region with a new story, new mega forms, new regional forms, and new custom (fakemon) pokemon to discover.

name: eFootball 2024
description:
eFootball 2024 is a football simulation game developed and published by Konami as part of their ongoing eFootball series. Released in September 2023, it is an update to eFootball 2023 rather than a completely new title, continuing the free-to-play model introduced with the previous instalments.

The game features updated team rosters, enhanced graphics, and refined gameplay mechanics.

name: Tornado
description: Fly the Tornado multi-role combat aircraft in this classic simulator. Master simulator missions and graduate to multi-aircraft multi-mission campaigns involving a vast array of aircraft and ground vehicles. Includes the Tornado: Operation Desert Storm expansion.

name: Street Pursuit
description: Endless Runner PC Game

name: Mars4
description: The first Real-Life Mars simulator.

name: Cave Digger 2
description: Cave Digger 2 is an action-adventure game in wildland valleys where you explore old mines, nautical caves and ruins of ancient civilizations inspired by western, dieselpunk and Lovecraftian themes.

name: CubeGate
description:
CubeGate is a 3D puzzle game where you have to escape test chambers full of dangers and hassles.
Solve them by shooting portals, moving cubes, pressing buttons and more, but be careful: One step in the wrong direction and you will fall to your death or get hit by a turret.

name: Angelic: Dark Symphony
description:
Angelic is a narrative strategy-RPG set in a dark and collaborative sci-fi universe.

Dark Symphony is the upcoming single-player campaign of Angelic.

name: Femboy Aim Trainer
description: Now you can train your aim with femboys. Enjoy and relax while shooting femboys!

name: Pangolin Cassowary
description: Pangolin Cassowary is a physics-based 3D platformer. Explore the city and find its secrets by kicking, rolling, and bouncing.

name: Pibby: Apocalypse
description: Pibby: Apocalypse is a mod for Friday Night Funkin' that is centered around Learning With Pibby: Apocalypse,

name: Super Junior Shake
description: Super Junior Shake is a rhythm based game based on the KPop band Super Junior.

name: Plat Wacky Adventure Remastered
description: Play as Plat Wacky as he tries to save the world!

name: Possess Quest
description: Possess Quest is a puzzle platformer where you play as the enemies.

name: Decollate Decoration
description: This is a point-and-click, command-selection style adventure game where the protagonist is a girl who has become a ghost. The objective is to fulfill her desires by speaking to her beloved "him" causing poltergeists, visiting in dreams, or even cursing.

name: Vacant Ark
description: Side-scrolling shoot-em-up in an atmospheric deep sea setting. Gameplay features 3 cyclable weapons and a close range "option" that changes enemy bullets into ammunition.

name: 3D Game Pack
description:
3D Games Pack contains this three games from Megaware:

- 3D Blockout
- Target Earth
- Gunpad

name: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets: The Chamber Challenge
description:
This is a mini game included in the DVD release of Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets.

The Chamber Challenge: The main goal in this game is to get through the Chamber of Secrets and get to the secrets that lie in the chamber. However, many familiar faces are quick to stop you on your quest. In order to get past, you must answer their quiz questions correctly. The questions vary from matching to sequenced order, all based on specific scenes in the movie. If you get anything wrong, you must restart. If you manage to get them all correct, you are in grasp of all the secrets that lie in the chamber. However, the quiz is always the same and there is only one ending.

name: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets: Spellcaster Knowledge
description:
A minigame included in the widescreen DVD release of Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets.

Spellcaster Knowledge: Triggered by selecting the wand on the study's desk. This is a quiz based on spells cast by various characters in the film, the scene plays up to the point where the spell is cast and the player has to choose what happened as a result from three possible answers. If an incorrect answer is given the game moves to the next

name: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba - Sweep the Board!
description: Embark on an adventure through iconic settings from the anime Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba in this action-packed board game. Compete with friends as you brave the elements on your quest to become the strongest demon slayer!

name: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
description: The game follows the movie's plot, following Harry Potter as he tries to enlist Hogwarts students to his new secret society, Dumbledore's Army, in order to teach students Defence Against the Dark Arts. Being a mobile game, the story is mostly via dialogues and the occasional cutscene; each of the game's levels is preceded by a text-only introduction that sums up previous events. The players control Harry as he tries to sneak through the Hogwarts corridors, unseen by fellow students; from time to time, the stealth sequences are interrupted by duels (twitch action mini-games) and simple puzzles.

name: Harry Potter Interactive DVD Game: Hogwarts Challenge
description:
Harry Potter Interactive DVD Game: Hogwarts Challenge is based on the first three Harry Potter films and allows the player to become a wizard-in-training at Hogwarts. It's built around fourteen different mini games as well as short video clips from the movies. As a student the player has to take classes and each class is represented by a certain mini game that is played with the remote controller. The game is divided into three years and for each year the player has to complete three classes to reach the year-end challenge and then advance to the next year. Ultimately after all three years it's possible to win tickets for the Quidditch World Cup. In addition to classes there are also additional mini-games called extracurricular activities that are unlocked as classes are completed.

The game can be played both alone or against up to three other human players. Each player then chooses one of the four houses at Hogwarts and compete against each other in trying to get the highest score. It is possible to customize the difficulty for each player and there is also a mystery wand option where the difficulty level changes depending on how well the player is doing.

name: Harry Potter DVD Game: Wizarding World
description: A sequel to Hogwarts Challenge based on the fourth, fifth, and sixth Harry Potter movies. The featured mini-games are based on elements of the Harry Potter universe, such as casting spells, making potions, and using the Marauder's Map. The game is narrated by Jim Dale, narrator of the US version of the Harry Potter audiobooks.

name: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
description: This is an action-adventure game set in the world of Harry Potter. Players can roam around Hogwarts and interact with various characters from the movie, such as Ron, Hermione, Dumbledore, and Hagrid. The game allows players to engage in duels by casting spells against other students, familiar foes, and Death Eaters. As players explore the magical halls of Hogwarts, they can discover and trade magical objects, as well as unlock secrets and mysteries within the castle.

name: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 1 - The Mobile Game
description: Play as Harry and work together with Hermione and Ron to search for Horcruxes while battling Death Eaters and Dementors using 20 different spells learned along the way. Progression involves puzzle solving and collecting magical artifacts. Main objective is to find and destroy Horcruxes and ultimately defeat Voldemort.

name: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2 - The Mobile Game
description: Live the most thrilling and magical adventure in Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows - Part 2, the final and ultimate mobile game of the saga. Embody one of the three iconic characters of the saga and engage in the final battle against Lord Voldemort. Experience an astounding battle mode that includes the use of magic and an auto-lock system and confront enemies and bosses from the novel. Gain XP points to increase your level up to 20 and learn new skills, including impressive magic spells!

name: Harry Potter: Mastering Magic
description:
Harry Potter: Mastering Magic is a collection of mini games revolving around Potter's main activity at Hogwarts (yes, that would be studying). The game has an interesting wrap-up where you need to play for a whole school year and pass your final exams. The game consists of the following mini games:

Astronomy - memory game (connect stars to replicate a star configuration)
History of Magic - quiz (Potter trivia)
Divination - visual recognition puzzle (an object is twisted in a crystal ball, the player must choose the right object out of several similar ones)
Transfiguration - a Tangram variant
Potions - memory game (count ingredients)
Care of Magical Creatures - common sense puzzle (feed the Thestral the right food)
Charms - word game (explore a grid of letters and form a spell)
Herbology - logic puzzle (grow plants by casting the right spells)

name: Pyramid: Challenge of the Pharaoh's Dream
description: Pyramid: Challenge of the Pharaoh's Dream is a 1996 education adventure game for Windows and Macintosh developed by Knowledge Adventure and published by Edusoft SA, published in Sweden by Knowledge Adventure and Levande Böcker.

name: Scarlet Sand Sojourn
description: During the event, complete Dehya's and Dunyarzad's desert outing and collect all the travel experiences on the way to receive in-game item rewards.

name: Herbal Remedies
description: During the event, follow the prescriptions' instructions and finish the medicinal brews. Upon completion, you will receive in-game items as rewards.

name: Turbo Leaper
description:
The multiverse is colliding!

Some dark force has awoken far away... Breaking apart the barriers between different universes has opened wild portals, leaking corrupting energy!

It is up to a rag-tag group to eventually put a stop to this.

name: Heroes Origins
description: Sin descripción

name: Key Hunters DX
description: Key Hunters DX is an re-imagined version of Sonic & Knuckles: Key Hunters!

name: Mario Kart 64: Mega Mushroom Blast
description: A challenging mod that implements RPG elements, level system and a lot of features

name: Mortal Kombat 1: Omni-Man
description: Omni-Man soars into the Mortal Kombat Universe joining the roster as a new Kombatant. This pack includes playable character Omni-Man, including all new move-sets inspired by the Invincible animated series.

name: Mr. Shootem Breaks Out!
description: Mr. Shootem Breaks Out! is an arcade-inspired puzzle-platform-shooter about destroying levels and levels of bricks by using a ball and pure firepower! Brought to you by a group of friends across almost a decade, it's a game unlike anything you've played before!

name: Mortal Kombat 1: Quan Chi
description:
Now a master of the Netherrealm's most vile sorcery, Quan Chi plots with Shang Tsung to conquer the realms. This pack includes playable character Quan Chi including all new move-sets.

Quan Chi is a returning character previously playable in Mortal Kombat X as part of the main roster.

name: Five Nights at Candy's
description:
No company is without a rival.

Freddy Fazbear's New Pizzeria has closed for good. And so, another restaurant is going to take its place in the world of entertainment.

What could go wrong?

name: Mortal Kombat 1: Peacemaker
description:
Christopher Smith, the Peacemaker, cherishes peace with all his heart. So much so, that he will kill anyone and everyone necessary to get it.

This pack includes playable character Peacemaker, based on DC's Suicide Squad, including all new movesets.

Peacemaker is a guest character based on John Cena's appearance as the character in The Suicide Squad movie and the Peacemaker television series.

name: Lloyd the Monkey
description: In the game, you play as Lloyd, a monkey trained in sword-fighting, as he travels the world in search of the gorillas who kidnapped his friends. As you get closer to the enemy base, a thrilling secret becomes unraveled before your eyes and you won't want to miss one heart pounding moment.

name: Five Nights at Candy's 2
description:
Rebuilt. Enhanced. Upgraded.
We brought joy to many, but that was long ago.
Broken. Fractured. Damaged.
In the end, we ended up where we came from.

name: Lloyd the Monkey: Remastered
description: Lloyd the Monkey: Remastered is a remastered version of the original game with various improvements, released originally for PC in the 2023 edition of Sonic Amateur Games Expo.

name: Mortal Kombat 1: Ermac
description: Announced for the Mortal Kombat 1: Kombat Pack, Ermac is a returning character previously playable in Mortal Kombat X as part of the main roster.

name: Five Nights at Candy's 3
description:
"I've always liked it when it rains...
the rain makes the silence go away,
it feels comfy and relaxing.
I don't like the silence
the silence means they're hiding
if they're hiding, they're coming closer
and if they come closer
they'll hurt me, for what I did- didn't do...
for what I couldn't do"

name: Mortal Kombat 1: Homelander
description:
Homelander, the ultimate patriot and leader of The Seven, descends upon Mortal Kombat. As a narcissistic sociopath with an insatiable need for validation, love and power, Homelander unfolds a new Era of tyranny in Mortal Kombat 1.

This pack includes playable character Homelander, from 'The Boys', including all new movesets.

Homelander is a guest character based on Antony Starr’s appearance as the character in the television series.

name: Cowboy 3030
description: Step into the Wild West future of Cowboy 3030, a third-person roguelite bullet hell where you dive into action-packed shootouts as different playable characters, each with unique abilities and playstyles, to take on notorious outlaws and criminals and rise to become top gun of 3030.

name: Lloyd the Monkey 3: Judgement Day
description: Two years have passed since Lloyd and Lura defeated Kronos and his Dark Gorillas, seemingly once and for all, and the duo have gone their seperate ways. However, the villain Scholz is ripping his way through countless lives in order to complete a decade-spanning plan to conquer the universe once and for all. The final battle is about to begin, and the blood shed at the end of it all will sow the seeds of a new beginning.

name: Mortal Kombat 1: Takahashi Takeda
description:
Seeking to right the wrongs of his past, Takeda swears to rip up Earthrealm's underworld by the roots.

This pack includes playable character Takeda Takahashi, including all new move-sets.

name: One Night at Flumpty's
description:
"Hi! I'm Flumpty Bumpty. I'm an egg. I'm immune to the plot and can transcend time and space. I brought you to this special place so we can be friends. I hope you are good at hiding, because I am coming after you. Have fun!" - Flumpty

Survive till 6 am by avoiding Flumpty and his friends. If you survive the entire night, you will have a new friend! If you don't, well... you'll see.

name: O-Bot The Robot 2
description: Last year O-Bot has stopped an invasion on his planet and now everything was peaceful. Until some strange lavender gear in a pile of junk activated itself and shot out beams everywhere, causing every creature and living things to be revived and teleported to one planet named "Earth". So O-Bot decided to investigate and find every piece of lavender gear to stop this chaos.

name: One Night at Flumpty's 2
description:
Once again Flumpty Bumpty and his assortment of awesome friends have invited you (kidnapped) to a special place to play a game! All you need to do is avoid them untill it's 6am and they will become your brand new best friends. If you the get to you before 6am well... best not think about it.

This new and exciting place is full of different set of rules you will need to learn quick and your only tools available include a light switch computer running with an old battery and a couple of vents.

Good luck and hope you make some great life long friends...

name: Schism
description: Schism is a challenging roguelite action RPG with guns, gods, leveling, and frequency-switching action. The combination of deep leveling and stat systems, full gun customization, deity worship, intense bullet hell combat, and difficult bosses make for a unique and highly replayable experience.

name: Quest 2: The Ancient Temples
description: Taking place directly after the events of Quest - The Adventure for the 6 Stones in the year 2036, the Wooden Knight and his friends, Alex and Brian, discover that the six legendary stones have to be recharged due to not being used in a very long time. This takes them to a region of Light Island called the Solar Region, where they have to find six ancient temples that can bring back the power of the stones. Along the way, they meet new friends and new foes, as well as beings that were around during the time of the Hero of the Past.

name: Peklo
description: It is forbidden to leave peklo. point & click graphic adventure made in twine for the Women Gamejam 2022.

name: Sal.
description: Sal. is a 2D arcade platformer that adds a twist, you have three floors to explore, destroy the Artlings, collect the Noskey, and find the secrets!

name: LEGO Batman 3: Beyond Gotham - Dark Knight
description: Experience the heart-pounding chase scene from the iconic film complete with cool vehicles and explosive action. Play as the legendary Dark Knight and Commissioner Gordon, as well as the Joker and his goons as they chase down Harvey Dent’s police escort. Bane and Catwoman from the third film are also playable.

name: Roadtrip
description: Sin descripción

name: Prawngeon
description: Sonic and Ö ran away from home and curiously Zodos knew where they were going. In Shrimpland is Prawngeon, a dungeon infested with shrimp and prawns, explore this mysterious place with Zodos and find his friends before it's too late (there really is no time). If you play carefully you can save a third friend!

name: Spacewing War 2
description: The galaxy-wide known cult Shine Tomorrow has taken over the Power Generators in the Center of the Galaxy, and you must stop them! In Spacewing War 2, jump into battle with many new unlockable weapon types and face enemies and obstacles from every corner of the Milkdromeda Galaxy.

name: Suck It!
description: Grab that vacuum! Suck items in order to grow larger and battle others in this fast paced multiplayer game!

name: Spekel Sparks
description: Take off through the groves of Blooming Genesis with the charming assistance of brother foxes' Spekel and Bekel, and their friends, who decide to take matters into their own hands to stop the unruly and vicious A.C.E. Corporation from fully diving the world into a biochemical warfare with their nuclear creations! Try out each character and see which playstyle best fits you? Team up with friends and infiltrate their bases together!

name: Trinity Heart
description: Bounce, whip, and blast your way through three challenging action stages!!! Enjoy bright scenery and goofy characters!!!

name: Uprush
description: Uprush is a platformer game originally developed for Mini Game Jam in 3 days.

name: Brawlers
description: One of the top Web3 fighting games, developed by Tyranno Studios! A rowdy collision of strategy and suplexes, designed by the Magic: The Gathering mastermind.

name: Simply Sudoku
description: A simple sudoku game for the Playdate handheld console.

name: Micro Games for Playdade!
description: Made in one day, Spin to Win!

name: Euro Truck Simulator 2: Modern Lines Paint Jobs Pack
description: Each one of the designs included in this DLC has been handcrafted and selected by our talented artist & vehicle teams for their stylish and contemporary design. This new pack includes six new matching paint jobs for your truck and trailer(s), all of which are fully paintable and customizable!

name: It Happened Here: Streaming Lives
description: Are you ready, detective? Step into a tale of mystery, intrigue, deceit, and murder!

name: Only Way Up! Parkour Jump Simulator
description: Defy Gravity in Only Way Up! - The Ultimate Parkour Experience!

name: Out in Space Bundle: Tin Can & Orbit.Industries
description: Explore space in two simulators - Tin Can and orbit.industries.

name: Assetto Corsa Competizione DLC Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Music Run: Hall of the Mountain King
description: Music Run is a rhythm based, fast-paced arcade game. The music in this game is a classic by Edvard Grieg - In the Hall of the Mountain King.(Credits to Kevin MacLeod)

name: Pac-Laby 3D
description: Pac-Laby3D is a simple, fun and very addictive game: the goal is to find all pellets in a maze. The maze is a ramdom construction and composed of 1 to 3 floors. The maze grows at each level, some pellets give options.

name: Talking Bruce the Panda
description: Bruce is your pet panda, that shows nunchakus, responds to your touch and swipe and repeats everything you say with a cute voice.

name: Train and Rail Yard Simulator
description: Sin descripción

name: Light-It Up
description:
It’s a dark world out there for a teeny little stickman like you, and it’s about time you light it up. Jump, flip and slide from one neon shape to another to make them glow. Collect stars as you play to raise your score.
Just when you start to feel like a stickman boss, things get complicated (or “sticky,” if you will) as you pass levels. Shapes start moving, rotating and even exploding, and lethal spikes become a constant threat to your poor little stickman life.
If you miss a jump or hit a spike… you fall into oblivion! Ready to light it up?
