name: Murder by Choice: Mystery Game
description: Experience a fully interactive murder mystery adventure set in the present day! Journey through a mysterious tropical island filled with hidden objects, secrets, and MURDER!️‍ Put your detective skills to the test by hunting for clues, gathering evidences, and figuring out who’s behind the horrific crime!

name: Night Agent: I'm the Savior
description: The game features an urban-fantasy story based on the manhua 王牌御史 (Ace Censorate) authored by Tong Yao and action hack-and-slash based combat system using character skills, character switching, and gacha monetization system for players to obtain new agents and guardians

name: Poly Match
description: Challenge yourself inside a polysphere world! It is the best choice to spend your time. Playstyles and moves are rendered in-game with meticulous attention to detail. Simple and fun for all ages. Get a completely new experience and relax your mind with 3d puzzle!

name: Tangled Snakes
description: Sin descripción

name: Trim For Your Dream
description: Step into the shoes of LA's top cannabis trimmer returning to reclaim his glory. Navigate the vibrant world of trimming, chase dreams beyond the physical, and immerse yourself in an unforgettable journey with a chill dub soundtrack. Rediscover your roots in this unique 3D cannabis simulator.

name: Sanguivore: Twenty Below
description: Survive and strategize with friends in Sanguivore, a first-person escape-room style nightmare. Your mission: lead your team to safety through one of multiple escape routes, while evading bloodthirsty monsters hunting you. Work together to survive.

name: Action Puzzle: Prism Land
description:
Prism Land is a bat and ball type of game that started with Breakout in the late 70's and in classics games like Arkanoid.
In Prism Land you play as Prism and Rhythm (a cat and a fairy) who set out to save the seven trapped guardians of the land in a game very similar in gameplay to Breakout. You play through the stages with the cat holding a magic paddle at the bottom of the screen bouncing a ball across the screen to break all the pieces set up on the stage.
There are 6 worlds (forest, sea, cloud etc.); each of which have 9 levels plus a boss level. You may play the worlds in any order you like except for the last world (the castle world) which is available when all the others are complete. You select which world to play from a game map.

name: Spellslayer
description: Take on the role of a spellcasting slayer puzzle tactics roguelite. Use a combination of clever positioning, strategic thinking and pure casting power to vanquish your enemies and claim the ultimate power source!

name: Vivid World
description: A follow-up to the hit game Vivid Knight, Vivid World is a completely new party-building, roguelike strategy game! Our story takes place in the Netherworld, a land ruled by demons. Utilize and master our protagonist, Lemuria's new Jewel Magic to conquer strange dungeons.

name: Dawn of the Wizards
description: Dawn of the Wizards is a grid based dungeon crawler RPG. The game that puts its focus on live melee combat. Fighting monsters in a dungeon, solving puzzles and exploring the world and events that led to the dawn of the wizards and the downfall of all who opposed them.

name: Dash x Survivors
description: Defeat endless hordes of demonic robots in this hack n slash action roguelike. Use 100+ unique upgrades to create your own game-breaking build and claim victory.

name: Only Fortress
description: Become the hero of your own fortress! Defend, customize, and explore in this PvP & PvM strategy game. Unleash your skills, lead your troops, and dominate in the battles. Build, fight, and conquer on the open world cross-platform online game!

name: Rogue Samurai
description: Rogue Samurai is a roguelike action game where you must battle against waves of enemies. Fight, die, upgrade your skills and fight again until you beat all your enemies.

name: Zero Piece
description: The great age of pirates have began, as a marine it is your duty to keep peace of the world. it`s not an easy adventure. Are you ready to face the challenges ahead to keep peace and stop pirates from roaming around freely? Become an Admiral and lead the marines to stop powerful pirates.

name: A Night With Angel
description: An interactive text narrative where charm, charisma, and seduction will be your key tools. Angel is an alluring and confident twink- each word, each glance, has deeper meanings as the two of you spend a fleeting night's tryst with eachother.

name: Runner's High
description: This game was originally featured as part of Compile's own Disc Station Vol. 10 (1996) for PC-98. Racing game featuring a girl with a jetpack.

name: Haneru no Tobira Wii: Kirigirisu
description: Haneru no Tobira Wii: Kirigirisu, with the aide of the program staff, you can enjoy the last minute program as it is!! In this game, which was popular at the time of airing, “How long can you jump the“ long ”jump box?”, “How many cake candles can be blown out?” Includes the last minute games such as "How much is it?" Anyone can enjoy with simple operation! Can you change the record of the performers!?

name: Kolobok Piramida
description: Russian bootleg of Uwol: Quest for Money

name: Toryumon
description: A one or two player puzzle fighting game published and developed by Sega in 1994.

name: Final Fantasy X: Fantasy War
description: An unlicensed game for the Game Boy Color, loosely based on the Final Fantasy series of RPGs.

name: Tian Wang Xiang Mo Zhuan
description: Unlicensed Chinese Beat-'em-up Famicom game.

name: Botanical Chronicle
description: Discover a third-person adventure as a robot seeking the last traces of life! Technology morphed into nature! Explore, unravel secrets paths, and escape dark forces of this mysterious landscape. Rivers, rocks, bushes seamlessly merging into digital realm and try to stop you!

name: Bang Bang Simulations
description: Players play the role of an amnesia "exile", looking for their own past in the end of the world. Gradually awaken your ability in the battle, collect and upgrade all kinds of powerful weapons to defeat the enemy blocking the way!

name: The Vorlec
description: Enter an adventure where you will have to make your way to the great metropolis, where hundreds of obstacles will stand in your way, you will have to be very careful because any obstacle can kill you...

name: Budget Backrooms
description: Free, open-source low-budget single-player Backrooms game using Unreal Engine 4.

name: Masquaradious
description: Utilize the power of the masks and explore the ever-changing world of Masquradious, where the stories is your to shape. Can the mask bring you to the happy end ? or will it bring you to the abyss ?

name: Stronghold Siege
description: Command your army against a relentless demon horde in this intense real-time strategy game. Master strategy and resource management to conquer the enemy's stronghold while defending your own in the ultimate battle for survival.

name: Egypt Frontiers
description: In the game Egypt Frontiers, players explore ancient Egypt, constructing authentic pyramid and making strategic decisions. The game offers the opportunity to learn about real history or create their own vision of civilization in both strategy and first-person modes.

name: Communication Breakdown
description: Navigate a series of puzzles, working in unison to guarantee the safe return of the capsule to Earth. Rely solely on verbal communication as you overcome obstacles and strive for success in this high-stakes mission. Will you succeed?

name: Village
description: A young boy has come to a distant village to visit his grandmother. Arriving at the final station, in some wilderness, we find newspaper clippings on the platform. This is where our tangled story begins.

name: Replik Survivors
description: This game is a time survival game with role-playing and roguelite elements. Through the choice of upgrades in battle to make the character stronger and stronger, defeat the oncoming enemies.

name: Blackjack Simulator 2024
description: Blackjack Simulator 2024 is a simple, fun, and realistic simulation of blackjack. Battle against the dealer every single round as you try to use the right strategy to win big!

name: Game Time Glizzys
description: Game Time Glizzy's is a casual cooking simulator where you must manage your money, sabotage your competitors, serve swarms of angry customers and pay back a mountain of debt to keep your concession stand alive.

name: Cookie Game
description: A casual arcade game concerning a bear named Bottle, the Cookie Game's goal is simple: to consume cookies. However, the missiles raining from the sky appear to be hindering this goal. Thus, you must make Bottle stronger by dodging these missiles and help her achieve her questionable dream.

name: Quiet on Set
description: Quiet on set! Action! Amidst a grand mansion, an elite movie production turns sinister with a sudden murder. Investigate, interview suspects, gather clues, and solve the murder. But beware, push too hard and you could be the next victim!

name: Xiangqi: The Chinese Chess
description: "Xiangqi—the Chinese chess "Is a strategic and challenging chess game, whether you are a beginner or an advanced player, you can find fun and learn in the game. You can search and download the game in the app store, and start enjoying wonderful chess matches!

name: Warplanes: Air Corp
description: Engage in combat at the core of the modern battlefield in Warplanes: Air Corp in VR. The third installment of the best-selling Warplanes series introduces a new era of modern military aviation. In addition to fighter jets and multirole combat aircraft you are able to pilot attack helicopters!

name: X-Plane 12: Aerosoft - Airport Menorca
description: The popular holiday island Menorca is now also available for X-Plane. The current aerial images come in a resolution of 50cm/pixel down to 25cm/pixel in the airport area.

name: My First Grade Fantasy Adventure
description: An early education game for kids with tons of mini-games and movies! Features draggable interactive objects, solving puzzles, & memory matches. All with visual and sound effects to support your child's learning. Enjoy this memorable adventure in one of the most comprehensive First Grade prep games!

name: Lofi Kitten
description: Step into the dreamy world of LoFi Kitten, where the soothing LoFi music meets the adorable charm of cats. Immerse yourself in a relaxing and heartwarming experience combining the challenges of puzzle games with the calming embrace of LoFi beats and melodies. Ready to let the music guide you?

name: Valthazar's Sanctum
description: Delve into the dark heart of Valthazar's Sanctum, an ever-shifting roguelite FPS. Confront sinister traps, and battle his creatures. Can you survive and retrieve the relic?

name: That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Succubus
description: Sumire was just like any other woman... until she was reincarnated as a succubus in a magical world! Now she must find her way back to her home world and survive the many challenges that await her in this fantasy realm!

name: Uberslaughter
description: Uberslaughter is an adrenaline-pumping retro Movement Shooter that pays homage to classic FPS. Embark on a gory inter-dimensional odyssey in order to neutralize high-priority targets. Butcher you way through hordes of enemies. Accumulate vast riches. Rescue a helpless kitten. And slaughter them all.

name: Elder's Grace: Unchained
description: Elder’s Grace, Unchained is a magical action RPG meets castle defense, building & raiding & battling game. Create customized treasure strongholds. Build teams to plunder others or battle until there’s only one.

name: Claire's Cruisin' Cafe: Fest Frenzy
description: Join Claire as she embarks on a journey of culinary discovery! It's the first day of the festival, and she needs your help to run her food truck successfully. You'll need to swiftly take orders, cook up delicious dishes, and serve them with a smile.

name: Spielbahn
description: Spielbahn is a small relaxing game that lets you unleash your creativity by designing and building your own tracks using various parts and decorations.

name: Don't Fall
description: Climb higher and higher in “Don’t Fall”! Face daring challenges, explore a world filled with secrets, and reach incredible heights. The sky is your limit!

name: Heroes of Eroticism: Opportunities of Love
description: Return to the world of Heroes of Eroticism in this final chapter. Finish Liam's last chapter, filled with love, lust and superpowers.

name: Monster 2
description: Although I had a good house, wealth, I had no girlfriend who could give me sexual comfort. But one night I felt very lucky when I found stray cat girls. After gaining their trust I had sexual pleasure with them. Grace and Lucy disliked it all at first but over time they both came closer to me.

name: WooLoop: Industry Pack
description: This Industry-themed gallery unlocks 21 additional levels for WooLoop! Each image is of a different industry in action! Heavy machinery, highly skilled and vital to our day-to-day life!

name: Beach Cafe III: The Escape Room
description: Grandpa is still missing and as you dive deeper into the investigation, everything becomes stranger and more enigmatic. The adventure of puzzles and mysteries continues with Beach Café III: The Escape Room. Investigate, discover all the clues and interpret them properly in order to advance.

name: Dice Crypt
description: Dive into Dice Crypt! A thrilling digital board game where you and your friends compete to conquer a mysterious dungeon. Roll the dice, face monsters, loot treasures, and outwit rivals. Will you conquer the crypt?

name: Hepo
description: The first volume produced by Gemini Hirono. The hero determined by playing rock, paper, scissors defeats the demon king. RPG format where you move around the map and defeat enemies It is a 2D STG. Score Attack allows you to move around the map automatically and play only 2D STG.

name: Probationary Girlfriend
description: I was given a contract to become lovers with a classmate for one month. After signing it, she's suddenly all over me...!?

name: The Route
description: You go along a road as your speed keeps going faster and faster until you lose

name: Guardians Of Gaia: Guardians 8
description: Guardians of Gaia: Guardians 8 is an introduction to the combat and game mechanics of Guardians of Gaia. Are you ready to take up the challenge?

name: Alborada
description: An idle forest game with a rich nature sound library. Discover, collect and customize your forest, set your ideal atmosphere to focus on your tasks or just relax and meditate with the sounds of nature.

name: Cyberpunk: Red-Light District
description: Cyberpunk Red-Light District is a game for adults set in the world of Cyberpunk.

name: 505 Game Collection
description: 505 Game Collection is a compilation game for PC by Cokem International. The game features sport games, puzzle games, action game, among others.

name: Stair: Slide the Blocks to Ascend
description: A gymnast who is in an extreme hurry is trying to climb upward. To help her, you can slide the colored blocks around to clear her way and provide platforms.

name: Bubble Hero 2
description: Bubble Hero 2 is a Windows game released in 1998. It is a sequel to the original Bubble Hero, and features new gameplay mechanics and improved graphics.

name: Street Harrier
description: A Street Fighter themed hack for Space Harrier.

name: Harrier Desse
description: A nonsensical themed hack for Space Harrier.

name: Rumic Harrier
description: A manga-themed hack for Space Harrier starring Rumiko Takahashi.

name: The Super Shinobi
description: An unlicensed and unofficial port of Shinobi III: Return of the Ninja Master,

name: Still Hunt
description: During the '90s, South Korea was home to many PC games that elsewhere would have appeared on consoles. Still Hunt is such a case, a classical run 'n gun very much inspired by Treasure's Mega Drive games, particularly Gunstar Heroes.

name: Reverthion
description: Eight warriors seek "Sentien", to obtain the ultimate power of creation and the title of "Reverthion". Reverthion is a third-person arena-based action game that pits two mechanized creatures against one another. It plays very similarly to Sega's contemporary hit Virtual On, and includes eight playable characters each with their own unique moveset and abilities. There is a single-player campaign with unique endings for each character, as well as a 2-player split screen versus mode; the Saturn version, Hyper Reverthion, adds system link support for two-player matches between two consoles.

name: Silk Road 2
description: The sequel to Sprite Road is radically different than its predecessor. Instead of a puzzle platforming game, it's a short overhead action-RPG reminiscent of Legend of Zelda games.

name: Disc Station 98 #00
description:
Software compilation for early Disc Station series, limited interaction on the third disc.

The First Disc is Prince of Perisa
The Second Disc is PowerMonger

name: Puzzle Games Bundle: 5 in 1 - vol.2
description: Train your brain with this awesome puzzle bundle!

name: Truck Drag Racing Legends Simulator
description: Crush obstacles, leave rivals behind, and become the ultimate drag racing legend!

name: Cyber Citizen Shockman 2: A New Menace
description: Jump, fly, and blast your way through nostalgic gaming.

name: Zombie Sniper Shooter: Stickman War
description: Shoot for Salvation: Your Bullets Are Humanity's Only Hope Against the Undead!

name: Best Multiplayer and Co-op 6-in-1 Bundle
description: Aces of the Luftwaffe – Squadron: The Aces of the Luftwaffe have returned! Dodge a hail of bullets and face their fearsome war machines in bombastic air battles and boss fights!

name: Shadow Bundle: Shadow Quest and Nightshade Ninja Warrior
description: Dive into this amalgamation of excitement, strategy, and allure, as you become the master of both light and shadow.

name: Royal Romances: Endless Winter
description: Sometimes saving one life can change the fate of many. Can you melt the ice in people's hearts?

name: King of Fighters XV: Characters - Duo Lon
description: This character is also bundled together in the available KOF XV Fighter Pass DLC character set. Please be careful not to make duplicate purchases.

name: Calamari Capsize
description:
"Calamari Capsize" is an exhilarating underwater adventure crafted for the Brackeys Jam 2023, where creators explored the theme of "Diving Deeper" with innovation and excitement. In this captivating game, you take on the role of a young kraken, wielding the immense power of the deep sea as you embark on a thrilling mission. Your objective? To plunge ships into the inky abyss within a limited timeframe.

As the mighty kraken, you'll command the sea's elements with your tentacles, relentlessly dragging ships down into the jaws of your formidable aquatic companion. The challenge lies in your ability to harness your newfound abilities to their fullest extent. Each vessel you pull beneath the waves adds to your ever-growing tally, driving your score higher and higher.

Prepare for an adrenaline-pumping experience as you navigate treacherous waters, overcome obstacles, and race against the clock to see how many ships you can submerge in the depths. "Calamari Capsize" combines stunning visuals, engaging gameplay, and the intriguing allure of the deep ocean, making it a captivating and challenging adventure for players of all ages. Are you ready to embrace your inner kraken and master the art of ship-capsizing in this oceanic showdown? Dive in and find out!

name: Chapter Zero: The Angel Island Saga
description: The world is a chaotic, terrifying place, rife with all manner of monsters, warlords and hostile architecture. Even for the mighty Pachacamac clan, just the act of survival is a day to day struggle, and everybody seems to know that they can't keep it up forever. In pursuit of a safe home, a lone shaman named Ichima happens apon the Special Stage - and with it, a means of realizing their dreams of safety and peace...

name: Daris Venture
description: Daris Venture is a half-Saturn/Advance-style fan-made game that will tell you an alternate history of Mobius that ended not in the best way for the Robotnik Empire.

name: Lost Alone Ultimate: George's Nightmare
description:
Find 10 candles and place them on the ritual table before the demons find you.
Your heart won't be able to withstand this psychological experiment.

name: Mobius Red Zone
description:
Mobius Red Zone is a Sonic fan game in the same universe as the animated web series Sonic the HEDHUG. The events of 'Big Space Race' set the mysterious Red Comet on a collision course with Mobius where Sonic and Co live. Later, the events of 'Dr.Eg.D.S.' may have reloaded the planet, but not the rest of the world, and the Comet is still slowly moving towards the Mobius, finally arriving many years later, in the time of The New Circle.
No one expected this to happen, but upon arrival, the Red Comet released the cursed energy that suddenly changed the world to its corrupted, horrible version of itself - the so-called Red Zone where even the small pretty flower in the background can turn into a devastating mechanical monster with saws and lasers, and cannons, and even more saws.
Now our heroes embark on their own adventures to reveal the truth about the Red Zone and, maybe. even stop it from spreading across the whole Mobius... yet it still exists.

name: Sonic Skywind
description: A Sonic game introducing fast paced combat with limited open world areas involving story progress scenarios and side missions.

name: Sonic Spectre
description: A 2D Sonic the Hedgehog fangame made with Clickteam Fusion

name: Sonic USB Online
description:
Dive into a frantic race with Sonic, the legendary blue hedgehog! Defy the laws of physics through twisted worlds to save your animal friends captured by Doctor Robotnik. Get ready to jump, turn and cross all obstacles in this epic adventure to save the world and free the innocent creatures!
Are you ready to roar, push the limits and become the ultimate hero? It's time to show your super speed and kick Robotnik's butt.

name: Incursion: Halls of the Goblin King
description: Incursion: Halls of the Goblin King is a freeware roguelike game based on the Wizards of the Coast d20 system.

name: Super Mario Continuance
description: Super Mario Continuance follows Riba from RPG Maker horror game "(Mario) The Music Box" on a quest to bring the Mushroom Kingdom's beloved hero, Mario, back from the dead. To do this, Riba must help Len Alwenia Foska (the god of rebirth) destroy an enigmatic entity who is traveling through time and erasing Riba from existence.

name: Counter-Strike
description: Counter-Strike, the world's most popular online action game and first-person shooter for the PC, makes its console debut exclusively on Xbox and Xbox Live. Counter-Strike for Xbox features single-player missions, taking place over a gritty realistic counterterrorist world. It allows gamers to challenge other players in team-based multiplayer games on Xbox Live and System Link.

name: Metamode
description:
"Metamode" is an action role-playing game for the Game Boy Color released by Koei in 2000.
The goal is to maintain world peace by having the protagonist join the "Keibi-tai" and use a tool called "Metamode" to transform into various jobs.

name: American Truck Simulator: Arkansas
description: Located in the south-central region of the United States, the state is a nature wonderland with three national forests, many State Parks, nearly 9,000 miles of pristine streams and rivers like the Arkansas and Mississippi, as well as the ever-stretching Ozark and Quachita mountain ranges.

name: Tiger Blade
description: Tiger Blade‘s story casts players in the role of a deadly assassin working for the Horangi chapter of the Tiger Clans. Ordered to steal a mysterious package from a rival chapter, you are shocked to find the object of the heist is a tiger cub. Thought to be extinct for a hundred years, the mythical creature is now desired by every gang in Sewoon and they’ll stop at nothing to take it from you.

name: Lynn's Legacy
description: Follow Lynn the mercenary as she recollects the mysterious mission that nearly took her life. Travel through multiple overworld areas, (forest, towns, desert, mountains) and boldly step into uncharted dimensions in search of memory!

name: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets: The Forbidden Forest Challenge
description: Escape the Forbidden Forest

name: Cappi: Starbound Saga
description:
Go forth, it is you who will save the universes... from annihilation.

Cappi: Starbound Saga is a 2D platformer with gameplay styles inspired by the Kirby and Sonic series. With Cappi, use powerful abilities and maintain speed to be able to save the galaxy in record time.

name: AlllCall
description:
This is a mini shmups.
The boss appears when 8 large numbered enemies are defeated.
The stage is cleared when the boss is defeated.
On the way, press the X key when you have money (ALC).
You can buy weapons and restore HP.

name: Roams.io
description: Roams is a foraging/survival game set in a colorful 2d environment. You start off as a mouse and aim to make your way up the food chain through eating berries to gain xp. Your objective is simply survival, do this by progressing up the food chain and avoiding predators.

name: Midnight
description: Midnight features 7 maps of Doom action with a dark backdrop. Each map is relatively short and aims to present fun and challenging encounters with small numbers of monsters (every map has less than 120 enemies).

name: Bang, Boom, Splat!
description: Sin descripción

name: Durak Online
description: Durak online - the favorite card game. The object of the game is to get rid of all one's cards. At the end of the game, the last player with cards in their hand is referred to as the fool (durak - Дурак).

name: Cassette Beasts: Pier of the Unknown
description:
Charge your oversized flashlights and steel your nerves for "Pier of the Unknown", a new DLC for Cassette Beasts! This DLC download includes:

A new storyline to seek and unravel
A spooky new location with three carnival-themed attractions to uncover and explore
TWELVE new monsters that can only be found and collected within Brightside Pier
Five new character costume options

This new addition to Cassette Beasts brings the total monsters to 141, meaning you can now unlock 19,881 fully imagined fusions!

name: Storm Warrior
description: You play as a Templar-style Knight, the Storm Warrior, through various different style levels (or mini-games) including an opening gladiatorial clash with a winged demon, an atmospheric journey across the ocean to a lightning-lit island, and a battle through dank caves.

name: Ghost House
description: A handheld game where you play as a ghosthunter inside a haunted house. Your goal is to kill all the six different ghosts and escape.

name: False Dawn
description: False Dawn is set a number of years after the events of Quake 4, where you assume the role of the best of a new breed of soldier, the Stroggified Marine. You can go where no regular human can and have been called upon to save humanity from the threat of a mysterious new super weapon developed by the vicious Strogg!

name: Karoshi: Suicide Salaryman
description:
"Karoshi" is a Japanese word and means "death by overwork". In this game many things are not what you'd expect and the goal of each level is counter-intuitive: you need to die.

Each stage presents a new challenge. There are several objects you can use to solve puzzles, and in later levels the game will even break it's own rules to surprise you.

50 clever levels and a boss fight at the end. We hope you have fun (killing yourself)!

name: Planet Zoo: Oceania Pack
description: All aboard, set sail for the Planet Zoo: Oceania Pack! Explore breathtaking archipelagos and experience the beauty and culture of the continent's sun-kissed Pacific islands.

name: Football Manager 2024
description: Progress never stops when you're pursuing footballing greatness. Gameplay upgrades empower you to develop a blueprint for success on and off the pitch. Pre-order for 10% off and Early Access*.

name: Combat Mission Fortress Italy: Rome to Victory
description: CMFI Rome to Victory Module Rome has been liberated! It's time to finish this war! Continue the march to the Alps as we introduce new TO&E that includes Indian, Brazilian, South African and Free French forces.

name: Combat Mission Fortress Italy: Gustav Line
description: CMFI Gustav Line Module depicts the desperate battle for the Italian mainland, revolving around Salerno, Anzio, and Monte Cassino, and culminating in the capture of Rome on June 4, 1944.

name: The Chant: The Gloom Below
description: Survive a mind-bending new chapter in The Chant: The Gloom Below DLC. Harness dark forms of Prismic Science with new ability upgrades and weapons against unpredictable enemy encounters. As each death leads you closer to escape, finding the right build is essential.

name: Resident Evil 4: Treasure Map - Expansion
description: Sin descripción

name: TheHunter: Call of the Wild - Hunter Power Pack
description: Take your big-game hunting to the next level with the Hunter Power Pack, which contains three bolt-action rifles known for their long-range precision and powerful performance.

name: Generation Zero: Tactical Equipment Pack 2
description: Take your guerilla operations to the next level with our second Tactical Equipment DLC! Using scavenged parts and tech, the Resistance have crafted five new items to distract, disrupt, hack, and blow up your enemies!

name: TheHunter: Call of the Wild - Hirschfelden Veteran Cosmetic Pack
description: Decorate your weapons, tents, and ground blinds with these unique cosmetics inspired by the Hirschfelden Reserve.

name: The Passenger
description: Alone on a crippled spaceship with a distrustful AI. What are you willing to do to survive?

name: Gravity Tilt
description:
Gravity Tilt is a challenging puzzle game were the goal is to get the earth through a maze of barriers. This game takes full advantage of the iPads accelerometer. You move the earth by simply tilting the device in the direction you want earth to move.
Along the way you must avoid a variety of obstacles. Some worm-holes have gravity that pulls the earth in. Others have a repulsive force that pushes the earth away. Try to navigate through the maze of obstacles to reach the goal in the least amount of time.

name: Obeebok
description:
Obeebok is a 3D action adventure game where you run, jump over traps and obstacles to rescue turtles from evil wizards. Run lush woodland and swamps. You must collect droplets of water to survive, avoid traps, obstacles, and enemies.
The game features 60 levels, each with its own unique challenges.
Use your skills and reflexes to make your way through the woodland and swamps, and be strategic in order to collect enough water to survive.
The game is set in a beautiful and dangerous forest. The trees are tall and the leaves are green, but there are also dangers lurking around every corner. You'll need to be careful not to step on traps or fall into obstacles. You'll also need to watch out for enemies like wizards and their helpers. You'll have to avoid wild animals such as scorpions and spiders.
Collect droplets of water to survive and stay healthy. Beware of traps and obstacles, including wood logs rolling down the path, giant rolling rocks, and falling rocks. Watch out for spiders, scorpions, and giant fish.
Save the turtles and defeat the evil wizards!

name: Last Flip
description:
One mission: collect more and more coins.It is a happy and exciting time.
"Last Flip" only needs one tap to control. It is easy to learn, but can you avoid all cars? Or just happy to collect coins and forget watching out... Beautiful sky with cute colors. More animals can be unlocked.

name: Harmony
description: Harmony app is very easy to play: take the line as a reference to tap the squares and mirror the music notes. The squares will glow when you tap on them!

name: Club Feral
description: From the 15-year-old BAFTA-winning developer of Operator 41, a little arcade rhythm game I made during lockdown. Defeat a series of increasingly aggressive animals in the Club, or relax and try to beat your highscore in Endless mode.

name: Gear Planet
description:
Only one mission: link all gears!
It looks like very simple. But at the beginning, you may feel it so hard...There's always excess gear.Don't give up.One hour later, you will find how clever you are!

name: A Butterfly
description:
A butterfly wants to cross all gates till the end of the world!
It is a beautiful, lonely, firm butterfly, die for trying! But it never gives up!
This is a one tap arcade game. Reflex is the key and time is more important.
Lots of beautiful butterflies can be unlocked.
Anime music and Movie graphics.

name: Resident Evil 4: Extra DLC Pack
description:
The Resident Evil 4: Extra DLC Pack is included in the Deluxe Edition and contains all the launch DLC available for the game, excluding the pre-order bonuses and the various upgrade ticket microtransactions.

The bundle adds the 'Casual' and 'Romantic' costumes for Leon and Ashley, the 'Hero' and 'Villain' costumes for Leon with screen filters, Leon's sunglasses, the deluxe weapons 'Sentinel Nine' and 'Skull Shaker', the treasure map expansion and the Original Ver. Soundtrack Swap which adds an option to change the games music and sound effects to the 2005 version.

name: Idol Land PriPara
description: Mobile Rhythm Game from Takara Tomy Arts.

name: Disc Station MSX #01
description: Early Disc Station compile.

name: Disc Station 98 #1
description: Early Disc Station entry. Includes demos for Regional Power and Toushin Toshi.

name: Disc Station #09
description: Disc station compile marking the swap to CD, features much more content than the previous compile works.

name: Disc Station MSX #02
description: MSX Disc Station Compile.

name: Manpuku
description: Short strange card game included in a Disc Station compile

name: Disc Station MSX #03
description: MSX Disc Station compile featuring some demos including a Baseball and Godzilla game.

name: Disc Station MSX #06
description: MSX Disc Station compile with Xyzolog.

name: Disc Station #11
description: Last PC-98 Disc Station compile.

name: Disc Station MSX #08
description: MSX Disc Station Compile

name: STDS00751 R+R
description: Shooting game for the X68000

name: Friday Night Funkin': VS Boykisser
description: Friday Night Funkin': VS Boykisser is a mod for Friday Night Funkin' based on the Boykisser meme. The song features 1 week, with the song No More Boykisser based on the song No More Nuzzles from Undertale: Halloween Hack.

name: A Wanderer's Tale: Celebration of the Century
description:
A bush wanderer exploring the native Australian bushland is approached by a Cockatoo who kindly asks for the wanderer’s assistance.

The protector of the area, a Crocodile, is turning 100 years old and all the local resident animals want to craft a ceremonial crown to present to her at the Celebration of a Century billabong gathering, before dusk.

Unfortunately, the animals cannot do it in time without the wanderer’s help!

name: I Wanna Commit Crimes So I Can Go To Prison Then Commit Super Crimes So I Can Go To Super Prison 64
description: Mario is captured and sent to the jail factory, and has to find a way out. Try not to explode!

name: Pocoyo and the Mystery of Hidden Objects
description: Lately Detective Pocoyo is getting many mysterious cases involving objects that have disappeared. Will you be able to help Pocoyo in this fun adventure and find all the hidden objects?

name: Bluey: Let's Play!
description: Explore, imagine, create & play in Bluey's house. There's so much to do! Wackadoo! Come join Bluey, her friends & family!

name: Picross S+
description:
A port/remake of the 3DS's Picross e series using the engine of the Nintendo Switch's Picross S series.

Notable changes include the translation of the puzzles from Picross e's Micross mode to the Picross S series' Clip Picross mode, as well as additional Picross and Color Picross puzzles unique to this release.

The base game includes all 150 puzzles from the first Picross e release in both Picross and Mega Picross forms, while puzzles from the remaining Picross e games are available as individual DLC packs.

name: Forgotten Symphony
description: Sin descripción

name: Finding Frankie
description: Finding Frankie invites you to participate in Frankie's terrifyingly twisted parkour game show. Stealthily navigate around horrifying characters, tackle obstacle courses, and swing and wall-jump through challenging parkour courses! This is a game show you wouldn't want to miss!

name: Dreams: Unlimited links
description: 《Dreams: Unlimited links》 is a third-person shooter competitive game that features a variety of unique heroes, exciting gameplay modes, and rich scene maps and battlegrounds. Players can venture alone or team up for thrilling multiplayer battles, challenging other teams.

name: Though the Heavens Fall
description: Though the Heavens Fall is a Christian game reminiscent of classic JRPG gameplay while presenting a perspective of the spiritual world using the Christian Mythos. One where God reigns supreme and though there is conflict in heavenly places, His will is imminent and unstoppable. The game while light-hearted and comedic in tone is backed by the reality that things in the spirit realm are real, our prayers have effect, and that no lesser principality will have its way forever.

name: Tank Mayhem
description: Tank Mayhem is an intense local multiplayer tank shooter with many unique power-ups and game modes. With a 3D environment and real-time lighting, this game aims to add a modern twist to classic 2D tank shooters. Have fun blasting your friends and trying out all of the exciting weapons.

name: Grey Heritage: Noble Duty
description: Grey Heritage: Noble Duty is an anime Tactical RPG. Follow Jaden, as he travels across the land and learns the truth about his country. Learn the origin of the war that leads to Grey Heritage: Faded Vision. Fight enemies in tactical combat and manage your army in this JRPG inspired journey!

name: Dark Odyssey
description: Dark Odyssey, an epic online rpg game that features idle playing, dungeon challenges, boss fights, character enhancing and customizations. Get ready to embark on a dark and thrilling journey, increase your power, team up with other players and save the world!

name: The Crazy Hyper-Dungeon Chronicles
description: Dive into a 2D roguelite dungeon-crawler with top-down views in glorious pixel art. Experience turn-based combat with arcade thrills, where weapons are extensions of your character with unique abilities. Each level is its own universe, endlessly reinventing itself for ever-changing challenges.

name: Cryowakers
description: Cryowakers is an exploration and survival game that takes place in a randomly-generated futuristic world. Play solo or with seven other players to explore, survive, build, and fight to uncover the truth behind the cryosleep experiments.

name: Sole Seeker
description: Land on unique planets to survive the horrors that await in this adventure survival RPG. Use the spoils to upgrade defensive buildings and explore the galaxy further. Can you survive the hunt all alone?

name: Isometria
description: Explore a procedurally generated isometric world solo or with friends. Build a base, explore caves, dungeons, tombs, deserts, and forests. Fight monsters, defeat bosses, mine rare elements, craft armor, potions, and more!

name: A Night On The Farm
description: Survive the night and uncover the mystery of The Farm, in an atmospheric horror adventure! Locate key items, uncover cryptic notes, gain access to [REDACTED], and make decisions that alter your story!

name: Dreadnought
description: Mow down the alien hordes, scout for resources and survive. Dreadnought is a mix of Action Tower Defense Survival and Shoot 'Em Up Bullet Hell where you control the ships turrets & defend against waves of enemies. Choose your weapons, upgrade your ship & brace yourself, the horde is coming.

name: Project Adder
description: A run & gun zombie-killing rogue-lite with weighty responsive gameplay that’s different every run.

name: Rogue City: Casual Top Down Shooter
description: Fight the mafia on city streets and save your city in this cop action shooter game!

name: Polygons Tower Defense
description: Defend this colorful world with a brilliant strategy! Strengthen your battlefield and don't let enemies reach their destination. Make amazing combinations, and choose the most powerful elements wisely!

name: Project Adaloria
description: An open world, free roaming, medieval fantasy realm. Survive and expand your own settlements amidst warring factions, dangerous monsters, and diverse characters. Choose your path: thief, trader, farmer, assassin, or colony builder!

name: Eredia 2: The Great War
description: A dark fantasy JRPG, sequel to Eredia: Diary of Heroes. Eredia 2 is set in an open-world enemy continent as you are made to partake in a war you are least interested in, but it's the only place where you can find some 'answers'.

name: Idles of Torment
description: In the darkest corners of a forgotten realm, a mysterious pet idol awaits your attention. This enigmatic creature is no ordinary companion; it thrives on torment and feeds on sacrifice. Your mission is to keep it satisfied, even as it grows increasingly sinister and powerful.

name: Rhythm Master
description: ‘Rhythm Master’ is a new concept rhythm game in which each stage proceeds in a battle format based on a story. Collect various characters and strategize using their unique abilities to fight against various enemies.

name: Mining Mechs
description: Unleash your inner miner as you commandeer a high-tech Mining Mech! Mine for valuable resources and upgrade your mech for even bigger hauls as you explore the underground. Mining Mechs is a small game that you can play alone or with up to 7 friends in online co-op and offers 4-8 hours of gameplay.

name: Horror Inside the Forest
description: Plunge into the captivating realm of "Horror Inside the Forest," an exhilarating game that tests your bravery. Explore a mysterious forest, confront supernatural forces, uncover secrets, survive the darkness, and escape its shadowy embrace in this immersive horror experience.

name: Pixel Puzzles World War II Jigsaws: Pack - Battle of Peleliu
description: Pixel Puzzles World War II, merging history with the definitive jigsaw puzzler on the PC platform.

name: Placid Plastic Duck Simulator: So Many Ducks
description: Placid Plastic Duck Simulator - So Many Ducks brings 27 additional ducks to the pool! Each of them is a brand-new duck you have never met, with a unique personality and, in some cases, new interactions.

name: Valor & Victory: Pacific
description: The Pacific War was a theater of immense strategic importance, with nations vying for control over key territories and vital supply routes. Valor & Victory: Pacific 1942 - 1943 plunges you into this theater of war, where the forces of Japan and China join the fray.

name: Landlords & Tax Evasion
description: Embark on a feudal adventure in Landlords & Tax Evasion! Build your empire, dodge taxes, and conquer your way to prosperity.

name: Filter
description: Filter merges fast-paced 2.5D action with advanced, yet accessible, movement mechanics. Offering online PvP through rollback netcode and a transparent MMR system, FILTER caters to casual and pro players alike. A rich single-player campaign and unlockable character customization.

name: Bit Tower
description: Bit Tower is an exciting Tower Defense game that will immerse you in an epic battle between adventurers and monsters! Hire adventurers, place them in the arena, face countless waves, and secure your spot on the leaderboard.

name: BastogneBreakout
description: Hex, Counter and Card simlation of the battles around Bastogne during the Battle of the Bulge in 1944. You play against yourself or play as Germans against Allied AI. Units are regiments, battalions and kampfgruppen. New Supply procedures make the Germans keep an eye out on the road network.

name: Mindfield
description: Experience the powerful VR short film, Mindfield, delving deep into the world of PTSD. Immerse yourself in this thought-provoking journey and witness the invisible scars of war in a whole new way.

name: Bring Me Home
description: Cute game about little octopus Blubi. You need to help him to get in his shell till the time is over.

name: Phrank's Photon Pharm
description: Phrank's Photon Pharm is a logic puzzle game set in the steampunk world of Underland. Explore the caverns of Underland, solve hundreds of puzzles, uncover who threatens Underland's denizens, Save the Pharm!

name: What Have You Done, Father?
description: An atrocious scandal threatens the Catholic Church when the lifeless body of a woman is discovered in the rectory of a young priest.

name: Europa Universalis IV: King of Kings - Immersion Pack
description: This Immersion Pack to Europa Universalis IV adds greater depth and historical flavor to the nations surrounding the Ottoman Empire. The focus is on the nations of Persia, the Mamluk Sultanate and the Byzantine Empire as each fights to survive in a region rich with conflict, drama and diversity.

name: Moonbunny
description: Meet the guy who had a one-way ticket to heaven yet decided to take the express train to hell.

name: Sands of Skullcreek
description: Sands of Skullcreek is retro style FPS. Your travels have brought you to this town that has been overrun by a gang. You decide to swear in as a deputy and restore order to this once peaceful place.

name: Midnight Prowl
description: Midnight Prowl is a horror exploration game set in a Japanese town, where you will experience the horror that takes place there.

name: City Story
description: City Story is a horror-suspense-declassification game. The story begins through the production of a paranormal program, where a newbie cameraman and a down-on-his-luck producer visit a series of paranormal legends happening in Japan for the program.

name: Sumo Tanks
description: Sumo Tanks is a tank arena fighter where players shoot and ram each other to be the last standing in the ring. Select your tank and claim the title of grand Sumo Tanks champion.

name: Fright Animatronics 2
description: Fright Animatronics 2 is a first-person horror game where your task is to work in a warehouse for a week. What can go wrong?

name: Paranormal Investigators
description: Paranormal Investigators is a 4 player co-op horror. You and your team are the hosts of a local TV show and explore abandoned houses with paranormal activity. You must make a video report and survive until dawn.

name: Medimon
description: "Medimon" is a health science-themed monster-taming RPG. Players capture, battle, and evolve creatures symbolizing health concepts, turning intricate biology into an interactive and captivating game experience. Dive in and make education an adventure!

name: Grave Digging Me
description: In this casual looter and crafting game, you join as a new grave digger. while expanding the town, graveyard and upgrading your tools.

name: Protecting the Base
description: This is a tower defense game, where you can experience the charm of war from the game summary, reasonably prevent turrets, upgrade your turrets, and win victory.

name: Survivors Last Stand
description: Survive waves of alien invaders. Upgrade your weapons and create insane builds. Addictive arcade roguelike action awaits you!

name: Robokid
description: You are the robot with mindset of a kid, but your robotic body allowing you to fight better than most humans. Your goal is to solve the mystery how aliens got into spaceship and, most importantly to discover "who You are for real?" A strange scientist will accompany you during the exploration

name: Last Stand
description: Future Agent Natasha finally found the recently awakened human hero, Morgen. This time, they must embark on a perilous journey back to the South Pole, seeking the origins of the impending world apocalypse. However, what awaits them there is a group of unknown enemies shrouded in mystery

name: Mood
description: This world has always been hostile to you. Human society disgusts you. MOOD - it is a dark visual novel where the player has to meet a cute girl and take a little walk with her. Nothing bad can happen, right?

name: The Scramble Vice
description: It is the year 2048. Tokyo Police Department’s notorious 9th Mobile Unit, “The Scramble Vice” is ready to fight high-tech robot crime! Clad in an armed exoskeleton suit, police officer Sakuragi Kei of the 9th unit stands to fight robot crimes within Neo Tokyo! Are you ready to scramble up Tokyo?

name: Tornado
description: 200 feet. 600 knots. Adrenaline off the scale.

name: Golden Leaf Jigsaw Puzzles
description: Unfold the tapestry of the season, from golden forests to festive harvests. With breathtaking artwork and a heartwarming narrative, it's an ode to autumn's splendor in puzzle form.

name: Medieval Kingdom Wars: Prologue
description: Rewrite medieval history through bloody siege combat in a fusion of RTS and Grand Strategy genres. Rule, build, and serve your King as a minor lord in medieval Europe. Experience siege, field and naval combat with an unseen degree of brutality. Rogue-like progression, epic towns and battles await…

name: Mokete
description: Mokete is a turn-based roguelike game with cartoon graphics and an alien theme. You'll take control of a brave alien who uses abducted animals in thrilling battles on Earth to become the zone champion and face mythical beings.

name: RoboWarrior Arena
description: Welcome to MechWarrior Arena, where you'll immerse yourself in a futuristic world dominated by colossal war machines. In this thrilling single-player robot combat simulator, you'll design and customize your very own robot, then pit it against formidable foes in the arena.

name: Served in Yong'an
description: Save the alcoholic, debt-ridden Mei by bringing both her restaurant and herself from ruin. Decorate your venue, craft cohesive menus, deal with unexpected situations at work, and connect with friends both old and new. Can you help her get back on her feet before the three-year deadline?

name: Muscle Ninja VR
description: This is a VR climbing action game with grip controls. Become a challenger of the muscle athletic show "Muscle Ninja" and conquer the steel demon castle! Your play can be streamed to an external monitor from a third-person perspective. Use your VRM model as your avatar and stream it!

name: Net Defender
description: Net Defender, a VR game where you play as a goalkeeper. With realistic physics, graphics, and immersive sound, experience the thrill of being on the pitch and improve your reflexes while having fun

name: ReversiBot
description: The roles of keyboard and mouse will be reversed

name: Osomatsu-san Protagonist Contest Pokoball
description:
Iyami and the others have come to steal the hero's seat! Throw a bouncy ball and fight against it!

Just decide the angle to throw the ball and release it! Throw the ball and attack it!
If you throw it aiming at the gap between the wall and the enemy, you can hit continuously and deal a lot of damage!

Of course, familiar members such as Totoko, Dekapan, Chibita, Hatabo and Dayon,
Oil King, Kamimatsu, and that character and that character
In addition, that character and that character will also appear in total over 100 bodies!

name: Disc Station #12
description: First PC available Disc Station game featuring a version of Madou Monogatari.

name: Pulse
description: Pulse is a stripped down action-puzzle game made exclusively for Playdate.

name: Resonant Tale
description: Discover a handcrafted pocket size world full of secrets!

name: Disc Station MSX #09
description: Disc Station MSX compile with a lot of demos.

name: Dinosaur Island
description: Dinosaur Island is an interactive story developed by Game Arts and released for Saturn and Windows 95, created by Izumi Takemoto.

name: TRL: The Rail Loaders
description: TRL: The Rail Loaders is a 2D shoot-em-up that plays for the most part on-rails - in this case, quite literally. One or two players control two trains (in single-player mode, the other train is taken over by the AI). The trains can only move on rails; switches are used to change between rail tracks in order to avoid traps or collect power-ups.

name: Whipplu Special
description: Simplistic Sharp block-sorter game.

name: Espalion
description: Shooting doujin game.

name: Option Monster
description: Short game bundled in a Disc Station compile.

name: Disc Station MSX #11
description: Disc Station compile, features Valis II demo.

name: Greener Grass Awaits
description: Greener Grass Awaits is a golfing horror game about a golfer breaking onto a golf course for an after hours game.

name: GunMaster
description: GunMaster is an obscure Arcade Action Game developed by Metro Corporation (creators of the latter Bust a Groove) in December 1994. The game was influenced by the earlier Gunstar Heroes from Treasure, but with some Fighting Game and Beat 'em Up mechanics included.

name: Genshin Impact: To the Stars Shining in the Depths
description:
Version 4.1 of Genshin Impact, which includes:
• New characters: Wriothesley and Neuvillette
• New areas: Liffey Region and Fontaine Research Institute
• New main story quests: Chapter IV, Acts III & IV
• New story quests for Wriothesley and Neuvillette
• New main event: Waterborne Poetry
• …and more!

name: Sex Simulator: Office Promotion
description: A sex simulation game with visual novel elements where you play the role of the boss who sleeps with his female employees.

name: Trash Goblin
description: A cosy and moreish fantasy shop sim where you uncover, clean, upcycle and sell a vast variety of trinkets - both invaluable and unlovable - to a diverse cast of fascinating customers across a colourful fantasy city. Think Potionomics meets PowerWash Simulator, with a unique protagonist!

name: Whisker Waters
description:
Whisker Waters is the ultimate RPG adventure that blends light fantasy and the art of fishing into a mesmerizing world. As a player, you'll create and play as your very own Cat character and embark on a whimsical fishing journey like never before.

Unlike any other game, Whisker Waters makes fishing the star of the show! Use cool fishing tools to explore and catch all kinds of unique fish. Each fish has its own tricks, making it exciting and rewarding!

name: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone: Third-Floor Corridor Challenge
description: Complete a series of puzzles to access deleted scenes in this game included on the second disc of the DVD release of Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone.

name: Dresden Files Cooperative Card Game: Fan Favorites
description:
POLKA WILL NEVER DIE!
… and neither will you, with help from the new heroes in this expansion for the Dresden Files Cooperative Card Game! This expansion adds two new character decks—Thomas Raith and Waldo Butters—and two new book decks—BLOOD RITES and DEAD BEAT.

name: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban: The Quest of Sir Cadogan
description: This game present on the second disc of the DVD release of Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban focuses on Sir Cadogan traveling through portraits to get to the Gryffindor Common Room to take the place of the Fat Lady as guardian of the tower, having various misadventures en route. The player must guide Sir Cadogan through the portraits by choosing between two paths at certain points, in choosing the right path will help him save time, and choosing the wrong path will result in him performing a time-wasting and usually in a comical fashion.

name: Alone in the Dark: The New Nightmare
description: The Dreamcast, PC and PlayStation 2 ports of Alone in the Dark: The New Nightmare feature major graphic improvements and the addition of lip synchronization for the polygon models during cutscenes.

name: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire: The Triwizard Tournament
description: A small game included on disc 2 of the DVD release of Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire. Take on the Triwizard tournaments with 3 mini-games focusing on each task "Dragon Arena" , "The Lake", and "The Maze".

name: Dresden Files Cooperative Card Game: Winter Schemes
description:
FEELING WINTER'S BITE?
Warm up with this expansion for the Dresden Files Cooperative Card Game! Includes two alternative character decks — WINTER KNIGHT HARRY and WINTER LADY MOLLY — and two new book decks — COLD DAYS and SKIN GAME.

name: Paper Mario: Dark Star Edition
description: Paper Mario: Dark Star Edition is a mod for Paper Mario created by ShadeBlade that adds a lot of new content to the game and increases the difficulty. Some of the content (various badge and enemy sprites and maps) was taken from Master Quest, but most of it is entirely new. This mod is meant to be about as difficult as Master Quest Jr, but there are badges that increase the health and damage of enemies.

name: Dresden Files Cooperative Card Game: Mouse & Variants
description: Bring Harry's faithful companion Mouse (with a dash of Mister) into the game with this character deck packet. Also includes 2 variant cards for Harry's deck and 3 variant cards for Susan's deck to add a little variety to your play.

name: Sonic & Blaze
description: Sonic & Blaze is a 2D fangame inspired by the Sonic Rush series and the 3D Boost games.

name: Sonic Battle Rush
description:
Based on the original on the Gameboy Advance, Sonic and the gang are back to duke it out with each other once more! Only this time as a 2D traditional fighter!

Fight as Sonic the Hedgehog and Shadow the Hedgehog in the Sage demo and learn the ins and outs of their expanded moveset!

Old mechanics from the original are making a return here as well!

name: Sonic: Before the Sequel - Redux
description: Sonic: Before the Sequel - Redux is a fan-made remake of Sonic: Before the Sequel.

name: Untitled Paper Mario Fangame
description: Sin descripción

name: Sonic Requeset
description: Sonic Requeset is just your generic Sonic fan game.

name: Sonic QWERTY
description: What if "Sonic CD" happened in alternative universe?

name: Sonic In The Timeline Of Madness
description: Sonic In The Timeline Of Madness is a fangame about the battle between Sonic and his friends against Eggman's evil plot. With the help of seven chaos emeralds, Eggman decides to mess up time so that he can carry out his plan.

name: Sonic Overdrive
description: Sonic Overdrive is a Sonic fangame that is a personal take on Sonic 4 episodes 1 & 2.

name: Sonic Outbound
description: Sonic Outbound is a Sonic fan-game set one year after Sonic Mania's bad ending where Robotnik had the Phantom Ruby and Chaos Emeralds in possession. After the final battle in the core of the Titanic Monarch, Robotnik was stuck in Little Planet and started collecting the Time Stones and preparing his greatest plan yet.

name: Annoying Orange: Kitchen Carnage
description: He’s cute. He’s Annoying. He’s an Orange! To some, he’s the king of comedy, the prince of puns, the earl of irritation! And to others, he’s just a royal pain in the butt. Call him what you like, just don’t call him an apple! He hates that!

name: Annoying Orange Pinball
description: Annoying Orange Pinball is a promotional pinball game for the Annoying Orange Show on Cartoon Network.
